content: 9 And I will suffer them to eat the flesh of their sons, and the flesh of their daughters, yea every one—the flesh of his friend will they eat,—in the siege､ and in the straitness, wherewith their enemies､ and they who seek their lives､ will straiten them.
content_old: 9 And I will suffer them to eat the flesh of their sons, and the flesh of their daughters, yea every one—the flesh of his friend will they eat,—in the siege､ and in the straitness, wherewith their enemies､ and they who seek their lives､ will straiten them.

content: 10 Then shalt thou break the bottle, before the eyes of the men who are walking with thee;
content_old: 10 Then shalt thou break the bottle, before the eyes of the men who are walking with thee;

content: 11 and shalt say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Thus and thus will I break this people､ and this city, As one breaketh the vessel of a potter, which cannot be made whole any more,— And in Topheth shall they bury, for want of place to bury.
content_old: 11 and shalt say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Thus and thus will I break this people､ and this city, As one breaketh the vessel of a potter, which cannot be made whole any more,— And in Topheth shall they bury, for want of place to bury.

content: 12 Thus will I do to this place､ Declareth Yahweh, And to the inhabitants thereof,— Even making this city like Topheth:
content_old: 12 Thus will I do to this place､ Declareth Yahweh, And to the inhabitants thereof,— Even making this city like Topheth:

content: 13 Yea the houses of Jerusalem､ and the houses of the kings of Judah､ shall like the place of Topheth be places defiled,—even all the houses､ upon whose roofs they burned incense､ to all the host of the heavens, and poured out drink-offerings to other gods.
content_old: 13 Yea the houses of Jerusalem､ and the houses of the kings of Judah､ shall like the place of Topheth be places defiled,—even all the houses､ upon whose roofs they burned incense､ to all the host of the heavens, and poured out drink-offerings to other gods.

content: 14 Then entered Jeremiah out of Topheth, whither Yahweh had sent him to prophesy,—and stood in the court of the house of Yahweh, and said unto all the people:
content_old: 14 Then entered Jeremiah out of Topheth, whither Yahweh had sent him to prophesy,—and stood in the court of the house of Yahweh, and said unto all the people:

content: 1 And when Pashhur son of Immer､ the priest, who also was deputy-overseer in the house of Yahweh, heard that Jeremiah had prophesied these things
content_old: 1 And when Pashhur son of Immer､ the priest, who also was deputy-overseer in the house of Yahweh, heard that Jeremiah had prophesied these things

content: 2 then Pashhur smote Jeremiah the prophet,—and put him in the stocks that were in the upper gate of Benjamin, which was in the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 2 then Pashhur smote Jeremiah the prophet,—and put him in the stocks that were in the upper gate of Benjamin, which was in the house of Yahweh.

content: 3 And it came to pass on the morrow, when Pashhur brought forth Jeremiah､ out of the stocks—that Jeremiah said unto him— Not Pashhur hath Yahweh called thy name, But Mâyôr-miṣṣaviv .
content_old: 3 And it came to pass on the morrow, when Pashhur brought forth Jeremiah､ out of the stocks—that Jeremiah said unto him— Not Pashhur hath Yahweh called thy name, But Mâyôr-miṣṣaviv .

content: 4 For Thus saith Yahweh— Behold me! making thee a mâgôr､ i.e. a terror to thyself and to all who love thee, and they shall fall by the sword of their enemies､ thine own eyes also beholding. And all Judah will I deliver into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he will carry them captive to Babylon､ and smite them with the sword.
content_old: 4 For Thus saith Yahweh— Behold me! making thee a mâgôr､ i.e. a terror to thyself and to all who love thee, and they shall fall by the sword of their enemies､ thine own eyes also beholding. And all Judah will I deliver into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he will carry them captive to Babylon､ and smite them with the sword.

content: 5 And I will deliver up— All the wealth of this city, and All her labour and All her precious things,— And all the treasures of the kings of Judah will I deliver up into the hands of their enemies, and they will make of them a prey､ and take them, and carry them into Babylon.
content_old: 5 And I will deliver up— All the wealth of this city, and All her labour and All her precious things,— And all the treasures of the kings of Judah will I deliver up into the hands of their enemies, and they will make of them a prey､ and take them, and carry them into Babylon.

content: 6 And thou､ Pashhur､ and all who are dwelling in thy house shall go into captivity,— Yea into Babylon shalt thou enter､ And there shalt thou die､ And there shalt thou be buried､ Thou､ and all who love thee, to whom thou hast prophesied falsely .
content_old: 6 And thou､ Pashhur､ and all who are dwelling in thy house shall go into captivity,— Yea into Babylon shalt thou enter､ And there shalt thou die､ And there shalt thou be buried､ Thou､ and all who love thee, to whom thou hast prophesied falsely .

content: 7 Thou didst persuade me､ O Yahweh､ and I was persuaded, Thou didst lay firm hold on me､ and didst prevail,— I am become a mockery all the day, Every one is laughing at me.
content_old: 7 Thou didst persuade me､ O Yahweh､ and I was persuaded, Thou didst lay firm hold on me､ and didst prevail,— I am become a mockery all the day, Every one is laughing at me.

content: 8 For as often as I speak I make outcry, Violence and wasting I proclaim,— Yea the word of Yahweh hath become to me a reproach and derision､ all the day.
content_old: 8 For as often as I speak I make outcry, Violence and wasting I proclaim,— Yea the word of Yahweh hath become to me a reproach and derision､ all the day.

content: 9 Therefore I say— I will not mention him､ Neither will I speak any more in his name, But then it becometh in my heart､ as a fire that burneth, Shut up in my bones,— And I am weary of restraint､ and cannot refrain.
content_old: 9 Therefore I say— I will not mention him､ Neither will I speak any more in his name, But then it becometh in my heart､ as a fire that burneth, Shut up in my bones,— And I am weary of restraint､ and cannot refrain.

content: 10 Because I have heard the whispering of many— “A terror round about!” Tell ye say they ､ that we may tell of him, All the men I am wont to salute do watch for my halting,— Peradventure he will be persuaded､ and we shall prevail over him, and take our vengeance upon him.
content_old: 10 Because I have heard the whispering of many— “A terror round about!” Tell ye say they ､ that we may tell of him, All the men I am wont to salute do watch for my halting,— Peradventure he will be persuaded､ and we shall prevail over him, and take our vengeance upon him.

content: 11 But Yahweh is with me､ as a mighty one striking terror, For this cause shall my persecutors stumble､ and not prevail,— They have turned very pale､ For they have not prospered, Confusion age-abiding it shall not be forgotten!
content_old: 11 But Yahweh is with me､ as a mighty one striking terror, For this cause shall my persecutors stumble､ and not prevail,— They have turned very pale､ For they have not prospered, Confusion age-abiding it shall not be forgotten!

content: 12 But､ O Yahweh of hosts— Testing the righteous､ Beholding the affections and the heart,— Let me see thine avenging upon them, For unto thee have I laid bare my cause.
content_old: 12 But､ O Yahweh of hosts— Testing the righteous､ Beholding the affections and the heart,— Let me see thine avenging upon them, For unto thee have I laid bare my cause.

content: 13 Sing ye to Yahweh! Praise ye Yahweh! For he hath delivered the soul of the needy､ out of the hand of evildoers.
content_old: 13 Sing ye to Yahweh! Praise ye Yahweh! For he hath delivered the soul of the needy､ out of the hand of evildoers.

content: 14 Accursed be the day on which I was born,— The day when my mother bare me let it not be blessed!
content_old: 14 Accursed be the day on which I was born,— The day when my mother bare me let it not be blessed!

content: 15 Accursed be the man who carried tidings to my father､ saying, There is born to thee a man-child! Making him very glad:
content_old: 15 Accursed be the man who carried tidings to my father､ saying, There is born to thee a man-child! Making him very glad:

content: 16 Yea let that man be—as the cities which Yahweh overthrew and repented not,— And let him hear An outcry in the morning, and A war-shout at broad noon!
content_old: 16 Yea let that man be—as the cities which Yahweh overthrew and repented not,— And let him hear An outcry in the morning, and A war-shout at broad noon!

content: 17 Because I was not slain from the womb,— Nor did my mother become my grave, Nor was her womb great for ever!
content_old: 17 Because I was not slain from the womb,— Nor did my mother become my grave, Nor was her womb great for ever!

content: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh,—when King Zedekiah sent unto him Pashhur､ son of Malchiah, and Zephaniah､ son of Maaseiah､ the priest, saying:
content_old: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh,—when King Zedekiah sent unto him Pashhur､ son of Malchiah, and Zephaniah､ son of Maaseiah､ the priest, saying:

content: 2 Enquire for us､ I pray thee､ of Yahweh, in that Nebuchadrezzar､ king of Babylon maketh war against us,—Peradventure Yahweh will deal with us､ according to all his wonders, so that he go up from us.
content_old: 2 Enquire for us､ I pray thee､ of Yahweh, in that Nebuchadrezzar､ king of Babylon maketh war against us,—Peradventure Yahweh will deal with us､ according to all his wonders, so that he go up from us.

content: 3 Then said Jeremiah unto them,— Thus shall ye say unto Zedekiah:
content_old: 3 Then said Jeremiah unto them,— Thus shall ye say unto Zedekiah:

content: 4 Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel— Behold me! turning back the weapons of war that are in your hand, wherewith ye are fighting the king of Babylon and the Chaldeans, who are besieging you､ outside the wall,—and I will gather them into the midst of this city.
content_old: 4 Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel— Behold me! turning back the weapons of war that are in your hand, wherewith ye are fighting the king of Babylon and the Chaldeans, who are besieging you､ outside the wall,—and I will gather them into the midst of this city.

content: 5 And I myself will fight against you, with a hand outstretched､ and with an arm of strength,—and with anger and with wrath､ and with great indignation;
content_old: 5 And I myself will fight against you, with a hand outstretched､ and with an arm of strength,—and with anger and with wrath､ and with great indignation;

content: 6 and I will smite the inhabitants of this city, both man and beast,—of a great pestilence shall they die.
content_old: 6 and I will smite the inhabitants of this city, both man and beast,—of a great pestilence shall they die.

content: 7 And after that Declareth Yahweh—Will I deliver Zedekiah king of Judah､ and his servants､ and the people､—even such as are left in this city from the pestilence from the sword､ and from the famine,—into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, even into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—and he will smite them with the edge of the sword, he will not have pity on them､ nor will he spare､ nor will he have compassion.
content_old: 7 And after that Declareth Yahweh—Will I deliver Zedekiah king of Judah､ and his servants､ and the people､—even such as are left in this city from the pestilence from the sword､ and from the famine,—into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, even into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—and he will smite them with the edge of the sword, he will not have pity on them､ nor will he spare､ nor will he have compassion.

content: 8 And unto this people shalt thou say, Thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! setting before you､ the way of life､ and the way of death:
content_old: 8 And unto this people shalt thou say, Thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! setting before you､ the way of life､ and the way of death:

content: 9 He that remaineth in this city shall die—by the sword､ or by the famine､ or by the pestilence,— Whereas he that goeth forth and falleth unto the Chaldeans､ who are besieging you､—then shall he live, and his life shall become to him a spoil;
content_old: 9 He that remaineth in this city shall die—by the sword､ or by the famine､ or by the pestilence,— Whereas he that goeth forth and falleth unto the Chaldeans､ who are besieging you､—then shall he live, and his life shall become to him a spoil;

content: 10 For I have set my face against this city､ for calamity and not for blessing､ Declareth Yahweh,— Into the hand of the king of Babylon shall it be given up､ and he will burn it with fire.
content_old: 10 For I have set my face against this city､ for calamity and not for blessing､ Declareth Yahweh,— Into the hand of the king of Babylon shall it be given up､ and he will burn it with fire.

content: 11 Now as to the house of the king of Judah—hear ye the word of Yahweh;—
content_old: 11 Now as to the house of the king of Judah—hear ye the word of Yahweh;—

content: 12 O house of David! Thus saith Yahweh, Administer justice betimes, And deliver the robbed out of the hand of the oppressor,— Lest mine indignation come forth like fire､ And burn､ and there be none to quench it, Because of the wickedness of your doings.
content_old: 12 O house of David! Thus saith Yahweh, Administer justice betimes, And deliver the robbed out of the hand of the oppressor,— Lest mine indignation come forth like fire､ And burn､ and there be none to quench it, Because of the wickedness of your doings.

content: 13 Behold me! against thee､ O thou dweller in the vale､ on the level rock, Declareth Yahweh,— Ye who are saying､ Who shall come down upon us? Who shall enter our habitations?
content_old: 13 Behold me! against thee､ O thou dweller in the vale､ on the level rock, Declareth Yahweh,— Ye who are saying､ Who shall come down upon us? Who shall enter our habitations?

content: 1 Thus said Yahweh, Go thou down to the house of king of Judah, and speak thou there this word,
content_old: 1 Thus said Yahweh, Go thou down to the house of king of Judah, and speak thou there this word,

content: 2 and say— Hear thou the word of Yahweh､ O king of Judah､ who sittest upon the throne of David,—thou､ and thy servants､ and thy people､ who enter in at these gates
content_old: 2 and say— Hear thou the word of Yahweh､ O king of Judah､ who sittest upon the throne of David,—thou､ and thy servants､ and thy people､ who enter in at these gates

content: 3 Thus saith Yahweh,— Execute ye justice､ and righteousness, And deliver the robbed､ out of the hand of the oppressor,— But the sojourner､ the fatherless､ and the widow do not oppress､ neither commit violence, And the blood of the innocent do not ye shed､ in this place.
content_old: 3 Thus saith Yahweh,— Execute ye justice､ and righteousness, And deliver the robbed､ out of the hand of the oppressor,— But the sojourner､ the fatherless､ and the widow do not oppress､ neither commit violence, And the blood of the innocent do not ye shed､ in this place.

content: 4 For if ye indeed do this thing then shall there enter into the gates of this house—kings､ sitting for David upon his throne､ riding in chariots and on horses, he､ and his servants､ and his people.
content_old: 4 For if ye indeed do this thing then shall there enter into the gates of this house—kings､ sitting for David upon his throne､ riding in chariots and on horses, he､ and his servants､ and his people.

content: 5 But if ye will not hear these words By myself have I sworn Declareth Yahweh— That a ruin shall this house become.
content_old: 5 But if ye will not hear these words By myself have I sworn Declareth Yahweh— That a ruin shall this house become.

content: 6 For Thus saith Yahweh Concerning the house of the king of Judah,— Though thou wast Gilead to me､ The summit of Lebanon Yet surely I will make thee, A wilderness, Cities not habitable;
content_old: 6 For Thus saith Yahweh Concerning the house of the king of Judah,— Though thou wast Gilead to me､ The summit of Lebanon Yet surely I will make thee, A wilderness, Cities not habitable;

content: 7 And I will hallow against thee Destroyers､ Every man with his weapons,— And they shall cut down of the choicest of thy cedars, and cast upon the fire.
content_old: 7 And I will hallow against thee Destroyers､ Every man with his weapons,— And they shall cut down of the choicest of thy cedars, and cast upon the fire.

content: 8 Then shall many nations pass by this city,—and shall say､ every man to his neighbour, For what cause hath Yahweh done thus unto this great city?
content_old: 8 Then shall many nations pass by this city,—and shall say､ every man to his neighbour, For what cause hath Yahweh done thus unto this great city?

content: 9 And they shall say, Because they forsook the covenant of Yahweh､ their God,— And bowed down to other gods､ And served them.
content_old: 9 And they shall say, Because they forsook the covenant of Yahweh､ their God,— And bowed down to other gods､ And served them.

content: 10 Do not ye lament for him that is dead､ Neither bemoan ye him, But weep ye—weep on—for him that is going away, For he shall not return any more､ Nor see the land of his birth.
content_old: 10 Do not ye lament for him that is dead､ Neither bemoan ye him, But weep ye—weep on—for him that is going away, For he shall not return any more､ Nor see the land of his birth.

content: 11 For Thus saith Yahweh— Touching Shallum､ son of Josiah､ king of Judah､ That reigneth instead of Josiah､ his father, Who hath gone forth out of this place, He shall not return thither any more;
content_old: 11 For Thus saith Yahweh— Touching Shallum､ son of Josiah､ king of Judah､ That reigneth instead of Josiah､ his father, Who hath gone forth out of this place, He shall not return thither any more;

content: 12 For in the place whither they have taken him captive There shall he die,— And this land shall he see no more.
content_old: 12 For in the place whither they have taken him captive There shall he die,— And this land shall he see no more.

content: 13 Alas! for him who buildeth His house without righteousness, And his roof-chambers without justice,— Of his neighbour taketh service for nought, And recompense for his work giveth him not.
content_old: 13 Alas! for him who buildeth His house without righteousness, And his roof-chambers without justice,— Of his neighbour taketh service for nought, And recompense for his work giveth him not.

content: 14 Who saith— I will build me a roomy house, with spacious roof-chambers,— So he cutteth him open its windows､ And it is covered in with cedar､ And he painteth it with vermilion.
content_old: 14 Who saith— I will build me a roomy house, with spacious roof-chambers,— So he cutteth him open its windows､ And it is covered in with cedar､ And he painteth it with vermilion.

content: 15 Shalt thou reign､ because thou art eager to excel in cedar? Thy father did he not eat and drink､ and do justice and righteousness, And then it was well with him?
content_old: 15 Shalt thou reign､ because thou art eager to excel in cedar? Thy father did he not eat and drink､ and do justice and righteousness, And then it was well with him?

content: 16 Did he not plead the cause of the oppressed and the needy､ And then it was well? Was not that to know me? Demandeth Yahweh.
content_old: 16 Did he not plead the cause of the oppressed and the needy､ And then it was well? Was not that to know me? Demandeth Yahweh.

content: 17 Verily thou hast neither eyes､ nor heart, save for thy plundering and for thy shedding of innocent blood､ and for oppression and for crushing､ to do them!
content_old: 17 Verily thou hast neither eyes､ nor heart, save for thy plundering and for thy shedding of innocent blood､ and for oppression and for crushing､ to do them!

content: 18 Therefore—Thus saith Yahweh､ Touching Jehoiakim son of Josiah King of Judah They shall not cry in lament for him Alas､ my brother! or Alas､ sister! They shall not cry in lament for him Alas､ lord! or Alas! his renown!
content_old: 18 Therefore—Thus saith Yahweh､ Touching Jehoiakim son of Josiah King of Judah They shall not cry in lament for him Alas､ my brother! or Alas､ sister! They shall not cry in lament for him Alas､ lord! or Alas! his renown!

content: 19 With the burial of an ass shall he be buried,— Dragged along and cast forth, beyond the gates of Jerusalem.
content_old: 19 With the burial of an ass shall he be buried,— Dragged along and cast forth, beyond the gates of Jerusalem.

content: 20 Ascend the Lebanon､ and make outcry, And in Bashan put forth thy voice,— And make outcry from Abarim, For all thy lovers are torn in pieces.
content_old: 20 Ascend the Lebanon､ and make outcry, And in Bashan put forth thy voice,— And make outcry from Abarim, For all thy lovers are torn in pieces.

content: 21 I spake unto thee､ in thy carelessness,— Thou saidst､ I will not hearken! This hath been thy way from thy youth, That thou hast not hearkened to my voice.
content_old: 21 I spake unto thee､ in thy carelessness,— Thou saidst､ I will not hearken! This hath been thy way from thy youth, That thou hast not hearkened to my voice.

content: 22 All thy shepherds the wind shall feed, And thy lovers into captivity shall depart,— Surely then shalt thou turn pale､ and be confounded, by reason of all thy wickedness.
content_old: 22 All thy shepherds the wind shall feed, And thy lovers into captivity shall depart,— Surely then shalt thou turn pale､ and be confounded, by reason of all thy wickedness.

content: 23 O inhabitress of Lebanon､ that makest thy nest in the cedars,— How hast thou bemoaned thyself､ Now that pangs have overtaken thee, Anguish､ as of her that giveth birth.
content_old: 23 O inhabitress of Lebanon､ that makest thy nest in the cedars,— How hast thou bemoaned thyself､ Now that pangs have overtaken thee, Anguish､ as of her that giveth birth.

content: 24 As I live Declareth Yahweh,—Even though Coniah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah were the signet-ring upon my right hand yet from thence would I pull thee off;
content_old: 24 As I live Declareth Yahweh,—Even though Coniah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah were the signet-ring upon my right hand yet from thence would I pull thee off;

content: 25 and I would give thee into the hand of them who seek thy life､ and into the hand of them from the face of whom thou dost shrink in fear,—even into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon､ and into the hand of the Chaldeans;
content_old: 25 and I would give thee into the hand of them who seek thy life､ and into the hand of them from the face of whom thou dost shrink in fear,—even into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon､ and into the hand of the Chaldeans;

content: 26 and I will hurl thee out､ and thy mother who bare thee, upon another land､ where ye were not born,—and there shall ye die.
content_old: 26 and I will hurl thee out､ and thy mother who bare thee, upon another land､ where ye were not born,—and there shall ye die.

content: 27 But unto the land whither they shall be lifting up their souls to return thither shall they not return.
content_old: 27 But unto the land whither they shall be lifting up their souls to return thither shall they not return.

content: 28 An earthen vessel､ to be despised､ thrown about is this man Coniah? Or an instrument､ in which is no pleasure? Wherefore are they to be cast out, he､ and his seed, and to be thrown forth upon a land which they have not known?
content_old: 28 An earthen vessel､ to be despised､ thrown about is this man Coniah? Or an instrument､ in which is no pleasure? Wherefore are they to be cast out, he､ and his seed, and to be thrown forth upon a land which they have not known?

content: 29 O land､ land､ land! Hear thou the word of Yahweh!
content_old: 29 O land､ land､ land! Hear thou the word of Yahweh!

content: 1 Alas for the shepherds､ who are destroying and scattering the sheep of my pasture､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Alas for the shepherds､ who are destroying and scattering the sheep of my pasture､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 2 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel､ Concerning the shepherds who are tending my people,— Ye have scattered my flock､ and have driven them away, and have not visited them,— Behold me! visiting upon you the wickedness of your doings､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel､ Concerning the shepherds who are tending my people,— Ye have scattered my flock､ and have driven them away, and have not visited them,— Behold me! visiting upon you the wickedness of your doings､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 3 I myself therefore､ will gather the remnant of my flock, out of all the lands whither I have driven them,— And will bring them back unto their own fold､ And they shall be fruitful and multiply;
content_old: 3 I myself therefore､ will gather the remnant of my flock, out of all the lands whither I have driven them,— And will bring them back unto their own fold､ And they shall be fruitful and multiply;

content: 4 And I will raise up over them shepherds､ who will tend them,— So shall they not be afraid any more､ nor be dismayed nor be missing､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 4 And I will raise up over them shepherds､ who will tend them,— So shall they not be afraid any more､ nor be dismayed nor be missing､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 5 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, when I will raise up to David A righteous Bud And he shall reign as king､ and prosper, And shall execute justice and righteousness in the land.
content_old: 5 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, when I will raise up to David A righteous Bud And he shall reign as king､ and prosper, And shall execute justice and righteousness in the land.

content: 6 In his days Shall Judah be saved , And Israel abide securely,— And this is his name whereby he shall be called､ Yahweh our Righteousness.
content_old: 6 In his days Shall Judah be saved , And Israel abide securely,— And this is his name whereby he shall be called､ Yahweh our Righteousness.

content: 7 Therefore lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, When it shall not be said any more､ As Yahweh liveth､ who brought up the sons of Israel out of the land of Egypt;
content_old: 7 Therefore lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, When it shall not be said any more､ As Yahweh liveth､ who brought up the sons of Israel out of the land of Egypt;

content: 8 but— As Yahweh liveth､ who hath brought up and who hath brought in the seed of the house of Israel out of the land of the North, and out of all the lands whither I have driven them,— And they shall remain upon their own soil.
content_old: 8 but— As Yahweh liveth､ who hath brought up and who hath brought in the seed of the house of Israel out of the land of the North, and out of all the lands whither I have driven them,— And they shall remain upon their own soil.

content: 9 As for the prophets— Broken is my heart within me､ Trembled have all my bones, I have become as a drunken man, And as a strong man whom wine hath overcome,— Because of Yahweh. And because of his holy words.
content_old: 9 As for the prophets— Broken is my heart within me､ Trembled have all my bones, I have become as a drunken man, And as a strong man whom wine hath overcome,— Because of Yahweh. And because of his holy words.

content: 10 For with adulterers is the land filled, Yea because of cursing doth the land mourn, Dried up are the oases of the desert,— And their oppression hath become wicked, And their might is not right.
content_old: 10 For with adulterers is the land filled, Yea because of cursing doth the land mourn, Dried up are the oases of the desert,— And their oppression hath become wicked, And their might is not right.

content: 11 For both prophet and priest are profane,—Even in my house have I found their wickedness､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 11 For both prophet and priest are profane,—Even in my house have I found their wickedness､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 12 Therefore shall their way become to them like slippery places in darkness, They shall be driven on､ and shall fall therein,— For I will bring in upon them calamity— The year of their visitation､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 12 Therefore shall their way become to them like slippery places in darkness, They shall be driven on､ and shall fall therein,— For I will bring in upon them calamity— The year of their visitation､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 13 Even among the prophets of Samaria had I seen a foolish thing,— They prophesied by Baal, And led astray my people Israel.
content_old: 13 Even among the prophets of Samaria had I seen a foolish thing,— They prophesied by Baal, And led astray my people Israel.

content: 14 But among the prophets of Jerusalem have I seen a horrible thing,— Committing adultery､ And walking in falsehood､ And so strengthening the hands of doers of wickedness, not to return any man from his wickedness: They have all of them become to me as Sodom, And her inhabitants､ as Gomorrah.
content_old: 14 But among the prophets of Jerusalem have I seen a horrible thing,— Committing adultery､ And walking in falsehood､ And so strengthening the hands of doers of wickedness, not to return any man from his wickedness: They have all of them become to me as Sodom, And her inhabitants､ as Gomorrah.

content: 15 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh of hosts Concerning the prophets,— Behold me! Feeding them with wormwood, And I will cause them to drink poisoned water,— For from the prophets of Jerusalem hath there gone forth profanity unto all the land.
content_old: 15 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh of hosts Concerning the prophets,— Behold me! Feeding them with wormwood, And I will cause them to drink poisoned water,— For from the prophets of Jerusalem hath there gone forth profanity unto all the land.

content: 16 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,�� Do not hearken unto the words of the prophets who are prophesying unto you, They are filling you with vain hopes,— The vision of their own hearts do they speak, Not from the mouth of Yahweh!
content_old: 16 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,�� Do not hearken unto the words of the prophets who are prophesying unto you, They are filling you with vain hopes,— The vision of their own hearts do they speak, Not from the mouth of Yahweh!

content: 17 They keep on saying to them who despise me, Yahweh hath spoken､ saying Prosperity shall ye have! And to every one who is going on in the stubbornness of his own heart have they said, There shall come on you no calamity;
content_old: 17 They keep on saying to them who despise me, Yahweh hath spoken､ saying Prosperity shall ye have! And to every one who is going on in the stubbornness of his own heart have they said, There shall come on you no calamity;

content: 18 For who hath stood in the council of Yahweh, that he should see､ and hear his word? Who hath given ear to his word､ and heard it?
content_old: 18 For who hath stood in the council of Yahweh, that he should see､ and hear his word? Who hath given ear to his word､ and heard it?

content: 19 Lo! the tempest of Yahweh! Indignation hath come forth, Even a tempest whirling along: On the head of the lawless shall it hurl itself down.
content_old: 19 Lo! the tempest of Yahweh! Indignation hath come forth, Even a tempest whirling along: On the head of the lawless shall it hurl itself down.

content: 20 The anger of Yahweh will not return, Until he hath executed､ nor Until he hath established､ The purposes of his heart,— In the afterpart of the days shall ye understand it perfectly.
content_old: 20 The anger of Yahweh will not return, Until he hath executed､ nor Until he hath established､ The purposes of his heart,— In the afterpart of the days shall ye understand it perfectly.

content: 21 I sent not the prophets､ yet they ran, I spake not unto them､ yet they prophesied.
content_old: 21 I sent not the prophets､ yet they ran, I spake not unto them､ yet they prophesied.

content: 22 But if they had stood in my council Then might they have announced my words unto my people, And have turned them from their wicked way and from the wickedness of their doings.
content_old: 22 But if they had stood in my council Then might they have announced my words unto my people, And have turned them from their wicked way and from the wickedness of their doings.

content: 23 Am I a God at hand, Demandeth Yahweh, And not a God afar off?
content_old: 23 Am I a God at hand, Demandeth Yahweh, And not a God afar off?

content: 24 Can any hide himself in secret places､ that I shall not see him? Demandeth Yahweh,— The heavens and the earth do I not fill? Demandeth Yahweh.
content_old: 24 Can any hide himself in secret places､ that I shall not see him? Demandeth Yahweh,— The heavens and the earth do I not fill? Demandeth Yahweh.

content: 25 I have heard what the prophets have said､ who prophesy in my name falsely､ saying,— I have dreamed! I have dreamed!
content_old: 25 I have heard what the prophets have said､ who prophesy in my name falsely､ saying,— I have dreamed! I have dreamed!

content: 26 How long shall it be in the heart of the prophets､ To be prophets of falsehood,— And prophets of the deceit of their own heart?
content_old: 26 How long shall it be in the heart of the prophets､ To be prophets of falsehood,— And prophets of the deceit of their own heart?

content: 27 Who lay a plot to cause my people to forget my name､ by their dreams which they relate､ every man to his neighbour,— Just as their fathers forgat my name､ for Baal.
content_old: 27 Who lay a plot to cause my people to forget my name､ by their dreams which they relate､ every man to his neighbour,— Just as their fathers forgat my name､ for Baal.

content: 28 The prophet with whom is a dream Let him relate it as a dream, And he with whom is my word Let him speak my word as truth,— What is the chaff to the wheat? Demandeth Yahweh:
content_old: 28 The prophet with whom is a dream Let him relate it as a dream, And he with whom is my word Let him speak my word as truth,— What is the chaff to the wheat? Demandeth Yahweh:

content: 29 Is not my word like this､ Like Fire? Demandeth Yahweh,— And like a hammer､ that breaketh in pieces a cliff?
content_old: 29 Is not my word like this､ Like Fire? Demandeth Yahweh,— And like a hammer､ that breaketh in pieces a cliff?

content: 30 Therefore behold me! against the prophets､ Declareth Yahweh,— who steal my words､ every man from his neighbour:
content_old: 30 Therefore behold me! against the prophets､ Declareth Yahweh,— who steal my words､ every man from his neighbour:

content: 31 Behold me! against the prophets､ Declareth Yahweh, who presume with their tongue and declare､ He declareth:
content_old: 31 Behold me! against the prophets､ Declareth Yahweh, who presume with their tongue and declare､ He declareth:

content: 32 Behold me! against such as prophesy the dreams of falsehood､ Declareth Yahweh, who have related them､ and led astray my people, with their falsehoods and with their recklessness,—whereas I had not sent them､nor commanded them, so that they could be of no profit to this people､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 32 Behold me! against such as prophesy the dreams of falsehood､ Declareth Yahweh, who have related them､ and led astray my people, with their falsehoods and with their recklessness,—whereas I had not sent them､nor commanded them, so that they could be of no profit to this people､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 33 But when this people､ or a prophet or a priest､ shall ask thee､ saying What is the oracle of Yahweh? Then shalt thou say unto them､ Ye yourselves are the oracle, Therefore will I reject you､ Declareth Yahweh;
content_old: 33 But when this people､ or a prophet or a priest､ shall ask thee､ saying What is the oracle of Yahweh? Then shalt thou say unto them､ Ye yourselves are the oracle, Therefore will I reject you､ Declareth Yahweh;

content: 34 But the prophet､ or the priest､ or the people､ who shall say— The oracle of Yahweh I will bring punishment upon that man､ and upon his house.
content_old: 34 But the prophet､ or the priest､ or the people､ who shall say— The oracle of Yahweh I will bring punishment upon that man､ and upon his house.

content: 35 Thus shall ye say—every man unto his neighbour､ and every man unto his brother,— What hath Yahweh answered? or､ What hath Yahweh spoken?
content_old: 35 Thus shall ye say—every man unto his neighbour､ and every man unto his brother,— What hath Yahweh answered? or､ What hath Yahweh spoken?

content: 36 but the oracle of Yahweh shall ye not mention any more,—for every man’s oracle shall be his own word, because ye have perverted the words of a Living God, Yahweh of hosts､ our God.
content_old: 36 but the oracle of Yahweh shall ye not mention any more,—for every man’s oracle shall be his own word, because ye have perverted the words of a Living God, Yahweh of hosts､ our God.

content: 37 Thus shalt thou say unto the prophet,— What hath Yahweh answered thee? or What hath Yahweh spoken?
content_old: 37 Thus shalt thou say unto the prophet,— What hath Yahweh answered thee? or What hath Yahweh spoken?

content: 38 But since ye keep on saying The Oracle of Yahweh, therefore Thus saith Yahweh, Because ye have said this word､ The oracle of Yahweh, whereas I had sent unto you saying､ Ye shall not say､ The oracle of Yahweh
content_old: 38 But since ye keep on saying The Oracle of Yahweh, therefore Thus saith Yahweh, Because ye have said this word､ The oracle of Yahweh, whereas I had sent unto you saying､ Ye shall not say､ The oracle of Yahweh

content: 39 therefore behold me! I will lift you up,—and carry you away､ and the city which I gave to you and to your fathers､ from before my face;
content_old: 39 therefore behold me! I will lift you up,—and carry you away､ and the city which I gave to you and to your fathers､ from before my face;

content: 1 Yahweh shewed me, and lo! two baskets of figs, which had been set before the temple of Yahweh,—after that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon had carried away captive､ Jeconiah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ and the princes of Judah､ and the carpenters and the smiths､ out of Jerusalem, and had brought them into Babylon:—
content_old: 1 Yahweh shewed me, and lo! two baskets of figs, which had been set before the temple of Yahweh,—after that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon had carried away captive､ Jeconiah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ and the princes of Judah､ and the carpenters and the smiths､ out of Jerusalem, and had brought them into Babylon:—

content: 2 the one basket was of very good figs, like the first-ripe figs; and the other basket was of very bad figs, which could not be eaten for badness.
content_old: 2 the one basket was of very good figs, like the first-ripe figs; and the other basket was of very bad figs, which could not be eaten for badness.

content: 3 Then said Yahweh unto me,— What canst thou see､ Jeremiah? And I said､ Figs: the good figs very good; and the bad very bad, which cannot be eaten for badness.
content_old: 3 Then said Yahweh unto me,— What canst thou see､ Jeremiah? And I said､ Figs: the good figs very good; and the bad very bad, which cannot be eaten for badness.

content: 4 Then came the word of Yahweh unto me, saying:
content_old: 4 Then came the word of Yahweh unto me, saying:

content: 5 Thus saith Yahweh God of Israel, Like these good figs so will I regard them of Judah who are carried into captivity､ whom I have sent out of this place into the land of the Chaldeans､ for good.
content_old: 5 Thus saith Yahweh God of Israel, Like these good figs so will I regard them of Judah who are carried into captivity､ whom I have sent out of this place into the land of the Chaldeans､ for good.

content: 6 Therefore will I set mine eye upon them､ for good, and will bring them back upon this land,— and will build them up､ and not pull them down, and will plant them､ and not root them up;
content_old: 6 Therefore will I set mine eye upon them､ for good, and will bring them back upon this land,— and will build them up､ and not pull them down, and will plant them､ and not root them up;

content: 7 and will give them a heart､ to know me､ that I am Yahweh, So shall they become my people, And I will become their God; for they will return unto me with all their heart.
content_old: 7 and will give them a heart､ to know me､ that I am Yahweh, So shall they become my people, And I will become their God; for they will return unto me with all their heart.

content: 8 And like the bad figs､ which cannot be eaten for badness Surely thus saith Yahweh— so will I deliver up Zedekiah king of Judah､ and his princes､ and the remnant of Jerusalem､ that remain in this land, and them who are dwelling in the land of Egypt;
content_old: 8 And like the bad figs､ which cannot be eaten for badness Surely thus saith Yahweh— so will I deliver up Zedekiah king of Judah､ and his princes､ and the remnant of Jerusalem､ that remain in this land, and them who are dwelling in the land of Egypt;

content: 9 yea I will deliver them up､ as a terror of calamity, to all the kingdoms of the earth,—as a reproach､ and as a by-word､ as a mockery and as a contempt, in every place whither I will drive them;
content_old: 9 yea I will deliver them up､ as a terror of calamity, to all the kingdoms of the earth,—as a reproach､ and as a by-word､ as a mockery and as a contempt, in every place whither I will drive them;

content: 1 The word､ which came upon Jeremiah､ concerning all the people of Judah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah,—the same was the first year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon;
content_old: 1 The word､ which came upon Jeremiah､ concerning all the people of Judah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah,—the same was the first year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon;

content: 2 which word Jeremiah the prophet spake concerning all the people of Judah, and against all the inhabitants of Jerusalem､ saying:—
content_old: 2 which word Jeremiah the prophet spake concerning all the people of Judah, and against all the inhabitants of Jerusalem､ saying:—

content: 3 From the thirteenth year of Josiah son of Amon king of Judah､ even until this day､ the which is the twenty-third year hath the word of Yahweh come unto me; and I have spoken unto you､ betimes speaking, yet have ye not hearkened.
content_old: 3 From the thirteenth year of Josiah son of Amon king of Judah､ even until this day､ the which is the twenty-third year hath the word of Yahweh come unto me; and I have spoken unto you､ betimes speaking, yet have ye not hearkened.

content: 4 And Yahweh sent unto you､ all his servants the prophets､ betimes sending､ though ye hearkened not, neither inclined ye your ear to hear:
content_old: 4 And Yahweh sent unto you､ all his servants the prophets､ betimes sending､ though ye hearkened not, neither inclined ye your ear to hear:

content: 5 saying,— Return､ I pray you､ every one from his wicked way and from the wickedness of your doings, So shall ye remain on the soil which Yahweh hath given to you and to your fathers,—even from age to age;
content_old: 5 saying,— Return､ I pray you､ every one from his wicked way and from the wickedness of your doings, So shall ye remain on the soil which Yahweh hath given to you and to your fathers,—even from age to age;

content: 6 But do not go away after other gods､ to serve them､ and to bow down to them,— So shall ye not provoke me to anger with the work of your hands, and I will not bring calamity upon you;
content_old: 6 But do not go away after other gods､ to serve them､ and to bow down to them,— So shall ye not provoke me to anger with the work of your hands, and I will not bring calamity upon you;

content: 7 Howbeit ye hearkened not unto me､ Declareth Yahweh,— that ye might provoke me to anger with the work of your hands､ unto your own hurt.
content_old: 7 Howbeit ye hearkened not unto me､ Declareth Yahweh,— that ye might provoke me to anger with the work of your hands､ unto your own hurt.

content: 8 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Because ye have not heard my words､
content_old: 8 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh of hosts,— Because ye have not heard my words､

content: 9 Behold me! sending and fetching all the families of the North､ Declareth Yahweh､ and Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon､ my servant, And I will bring them in against this land､ and against its inhabitants, and against all these nations､ round about,— And I will devote them to destruction, and make them an astonishment and a hissing, and age-abiding desolations.
content_old: 9 Behold me! sending and fetching all the families of the North､ Declareth Yahweh､ and Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon､ my servant, And I will bring them in against this land､ and against its inhabitants, and against all these nations､ round about,— And I will devote them to destruction, and make them an astonishment and a hissing, and age-abiding desolations.

content: 10 And I will banish from among them— The voice of joy､ and the voice of gladness, The voice of the bridegroom､ and the voice of the bride,— The sound of the millstones, and the light of the lamp:
content_old: 10 And I will banish from among them— The voice of joy､ and the voice of gladness, The voice of the bridegroom､ and the voice of the bride,— The sound of the millstones, and the light of the lamp:

content: 11 So shall all this land become､ a desolation､ an astonishment, And these nations shall serve the king of Babylon､ seventy years.
content_old: 11 So shall all this land become､ a desolation､ an astonishment, And these nations shall serve the king of Babylon､ seventy years.

content: 12 And it shall come to pass— When the seventy years are fulfilled I will visit upon the king of Babylon and upon that nation､ Declareth Yahweh､ their iniquity, and upon the land of the Chaldeans,—and I will turn it into age-abiding desolations.
content_old: 12 And it shall come to pass— When the seventy years are fulfilled I will visit upon the king of Babylon and upon that nation､ Declareth Yahweh､ their iniquity, and upon the land of the Chaldeans,—and I will turn it into age-abiding desolations.

content: 13 So will I bring upon that land, All my words which I have spoken against it,— Even all that is written in this book, which Jeremiah hath prophesied against all the nations.
content_old: 13 So will I bring upon that land, All my words which I have spoken against it,— Even all that is written in this book, which Jeremiah hath prophesied against all the nations.

content: 14 For many nations､ and great kings､ have used even them as slaves, So will I recompense to them— According to their deed､ and According to the work of their own hands.
content_old: 14 For many nations､ and great kings､ have used even them as slaves, So will I recompense to them— According to their deed､ and According to the work of their own hands.

content: 15 For thus said Yahweh､ God of Israel unto me, Take this cup of indignation wine､ out of my hand,—and cause all the nations unto whom I am sending thee to drink it:
content_old: 15 For thus said Yahweh､ God of Israel unto me, Take this cup of indignation wine､ out of my hand,—and cause all the nations unto whom I am sending thee to drink it:

content: 16 Yea they shall drink､ and reel to and fro､ and act as madmen, because of the sword which I am sending between them.
content_old: 16 Yea they shall drink､ and reel to and fro､ and act as madmen, because of the sword which I am sending between them.

content: 17 So I took the cup out of the hand of Yahweh,—and caused all the nations､ unto whom Yahweh had sent me､ to drink:
content_old: 17 So I took the cup out of the hand of Yahweh,—and caused all the nations､ unto whom Yahweh had sent me､ to drink:

content: 18 to wit､ said he— Jerusalem､ and the cities of Judah, and her kings､ her princes,—making them a desolation､ an astonishment, a hissing､ and a contempt, as at this day;
content_old: 18 to wit､ said he— Jerusalem､ and the cities of Judah, and her kings､ her princes,—making them a desolation､ an astonishment, a hissing､ and a contempt, as at this day;

content: 19 Pharaoh king of Egypt､ and his servants､ and his princes, and all his people;
content_old: 19 Pharaoh king of Egypt､ and his servants､ and his princes, and all his people;

content: 20 And all the Bedawin, and all the kings of the land of Uz,—and all the kings of the land of the Philistines, even Ashkelon､ and Gaza､ and Ekron, and the remnant of Ashdod;
content_old: 20 And all the Bedawin, and all the kings of the land of Uz,—and all the kings of the land of the Philistines, even Ashkelon､ and Gaza､ and Ekron, and the remnant of Ashdod;

content: 21 Edom and Moab､ and the sons of Ammon;
content_old: 21 Edom and Moab､ and the sons of Ammon;

content: 22 And all the kings of Tyre, and all the kings of Zidon,—and the kings of the Coastland, that is beyond the sea;
content_old: 22 And all the kings of Tyre, and all the kings of Zidon,—and the kings of the Coastland, that is beyond the sea;

content: 23 Dedan､ and Tema､ and Buz, and all the clipt-beards;
content_old: 23 Dedan､ and Tema､ and Buz, and all the clipt-beards;

content: 24 And all the kings of Arabia, and all the kings of the Bedawin who dwell in the desert;
content_old: 24 And all the kings of Arabia, and all the kings of the Bedawin who dwell in the desert;

content: 25 And all the kings of Zimri､ and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes;
content_old: 25 And all the kings of Zimri､ and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes;

content: 26 And all the kings of the North､ the near and the far､ every man with his brother, and all the kingdoms of the earth､ which are on the face of the ground; And the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.
content_old: 26 And all the kings of the North､ the near and the far､ every man with his brother, and all the kingdoms of the earth､ which are on the face of the ground; And the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.

content: 27 Therefore shalt thou say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､— Drink ye and be drunken､ and vomit, and fall､ and rise not,—because of the sword which I am sending between you.
content_old: 27 Therefore shalt thou say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､— Drink ye and be drunken､ and vomit, and fall､ and rise not,—because of the sword which I am sending between you.

content: 28 And it shall be when they shall refuse to take the cup at thy hand､ to drink then shalt thou say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ Ye shall certainly drink;
content_old: 28 And it shall be when they shall refuse to take the cup at thy hand､ to drink then shalt thou say unto them— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ Ye shall certainly drink;

content: 29 For lo! with the city on which my Name hath been called am I making a beginning of sending calamity, And shall ye be held guiltless? Ye shall not be held guiltless: For a sword am I proclaiming against all the inhabitants of the earth, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 29 For lo! with the city on which my Name hath been called am I making a beginning of sending calamity, And shall ye be held guiltless? Ye shall not be held guiltless: For a sword am I proclaiming against all the inhabitants of the earth, Declareth Yahweh of hosts.

content: 30 Thou, therefore､ shalt prophesy against them all these words,—and shalt say unto them— Yahweh from on high will roar､ Yea from his holy habitation will utter his voice, He will roar mightily over his home, With a shout as of them who tread the winepress will he answer unto all the inhabitants of the earth.
content_old: 30 Thou, therefore､ shalt prophesy against them all these words,—and shalt say unto them— Yahweh from on high will roar､ Yea from his holy habitation will utter his voice, He will roar mightily over his home, With a shout as of them who tread the winepress will he answer unto all the inhabitants of the earth.

content: 31 There hath come in a tumult､ as far as the end of the earth, For a controversy hath Yahweh with the nations, Himself hath entered into judgment with all flesh,— As for the lawless he hath delivered them to the sword､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 31 There hath come in a tumult､ as far as the end of the earth, For a controversy hath Yahweh with the nations, Himself hath entered into judgment with all flesh,— As for the lawless he hath delivered them to the sword､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 32 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Lo! calamity! going forth from nation to nation,— And a great tempest shall be stirred up､ out of the remote parts of the earth.
content_old: 32 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Lo! calamity! going forth from nation to nation,— And a great tempest shall be stirred up､ out of the remote parts of the earth.

content: 33 Then shall the slain of Yahweh in that day be from one end of the earth､ even unto the other end of the earth,— They shall not be lamented､ nor gathered together､ nor buried, As dung､ on the face of the ground shall they serve.
content_old: 33 Then shall the slain of Yahweh in that day be from one end of the earth､ even unto the other end of the earth,— They shall not be lamented､ nor gathered together､ nor buried, As dung､ on the face of the ground shall they serve.

content: 34 Howl､ ye shepherds､ and make outcry､ And roll in the dust､ ye illustrious of the flock, Because your days for being slaughtered are fulfilled,— Therefore will I break you in pieces, and ye shall fall､ like a precious vessel!
content_old: 34 Howl､ ye shepherds､ and make outcry､ And roll in the dust､ ye illustrious of the flock, Because your days for being slaughtered are fulfilled,— Therefore will I break you in pieces, and ye shall fall､ like a precious vessel!

content: 35 Then shall place of refuge vanish from the shepherds, And escape､ from the illustrious of the flock.
content_old: 35 Then shall place of refuge vanish from the shepherds, And escape､ from the illustrious of the flock.

content: 36 The voice of the outcry of the shepherds! Yea the howling of the illustrious of the flock!— Because Yahweh is laying waste the grounds where they fed.
content_old: 36 The voice of the outcry of the shepherds! Yea the howling of the illustrious of the flock!— Because Yahweh is laying waste the grounds where they fed.

content: 37 Then shall be silenced the prosperous pastures,— Because of the fierceness of the anger of Yahweh.
content_old: 37 Then shall be silenced the prosperous pastures,— Because of the fierceness of the anger of Yahweh.

content: 1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah came this word from Yahweh､ saying:
content_old: 1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah came this word from Yahweh､ saying:

content: 2 Thus saith Yahweh,— Stand thou in the court of the house of Yahweh, and speak unto all the cities of Judah､ who are entering in to bow down in the house of Yahweh, all the words which I have commanded thee to speak unto them,—do not thou keep back a word:
content_old: 2 Thus saith Yahweh,— Stand thou in the court of the house of Yahweh, and speak unto all the cities of Judah､ who are entering in to bow down in the house of Yahweh, all the words which I have commanded thee to speak unto them,—do not thou keep back a word:

content: 3 Peradventure they will hear､ and return every man from his wicked way,—and I shall repent as to the calamity which I am devising to execute upon them､ because of the wickedness of their doings:
content_old: 3 Peradventure they will hear､ and return every man from his wicked way,—and I shall repent as to the calamity which I am devising to execute upon them､ because of the wickedness of their doings:

content: 4 Therefore shalt thou say unto them､ Thus saith Yahweh,— If ye will not hearken unto me, To walk in my law which I have set before you;
content_old: 4 Therefore shalt thou say unto them､ Thus saith Yahweh,— If ye will not hearken unto me, To walk in my law which I have set before you;

content: 5 To hearken unto the words of my servants the prophets, whom I am sending unto you､ even betimes sending､ though ye have not hearkened
content_old: 5 To hearken unto the words of my servants the prophets, whom I am sending unto you､ even betimes sending､ though ye have not hearkened

content: 6 Then I will make this house like Shiloh,— And this city will I make a contempt to all the nations of the earth.
content_old: 6 Then I will make this house like Shiloh,— And this city will I make a contempt to all the nations of the earth.

content: 7 So the priests and the prophets､ and all the people, heard Jeremiah､ speaking these words in the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 7 So the priests and the prophets､ and all the people, heard Jeremiah､ speaking these words in the house of Yahweh.

content: 8 And it came to pass when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking all that Yahweh had commanded him to speak unto all the people that the priests､ and the prophets､ and all the people､ laid hold of him, saying— Thou shalt surely die!
content_old: 8 And it came to pass when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking all that Yahweh had commanded him to speak unto all the people that the priests､ and the prophets､ and all the people､ laid hold of him, saying— Thou shalt surely die!

content: 9 Why hast thou prophesied in the name of Yahweh, saying､ Like Shiloh shall this house become, And this city shall be desolate､ without inhabitant? And all the people were gathered together unto Jeremiah､ in the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 9 Why hast thou prophesied in the name of Yahweh, saying､ Like Shiloh shall this house become, And this city shall be desolate､ without inhabitant? And all the people were gathered together unto Jeremiah､ in the house of Yahweh.

content: 10 When the princes of Judah heard these things then came they up out of the house of the king､ unto the house of Yahweh,—and took their seats in the opening of the new gate of Yahweh.
content_old: 10 When the princes of Judah heard these things then came they up out of the house of the king､ unto the house of Yahweh,—and took their seats in the opening of the new gate of Yahweh.

content: 11 Then spake the priests and the prophets unto the princes, and unto all the people, saying,— Worthy of death is this man, because he hath prophesied against this city, as ye have heard､ with your own ears.
content_old: 11 Then spake the priests and the prophets unto the princes, and unto all the people, saying,— Worthy of death is this man, because he hath prophesied against this city, as ye have heard､ with your own ears.

content: 12 Then spake Jeremiah､ unto all the princes and unto all the people､ saying,— Yahweh sent me to prophesy against this house､ and against this city, all the words that ye have heard.
content_old: 12 Then spake Jeremiah､ unto all the princes and unto all the people､ saying,— Yahweh sent me to prophesy against this house､ and against this city, all the words that ye have heard.

content: 13 Now therefore､ amend your ways､ and your doings, and hearken unto the voice of Yahweh your God,—that Yahweh may repent him, as to the calamity which he hath spoken concerning you.
content_old: 13 Now therefore､ amend your ways､ and your doings, and hearken unto the voice of Yahweh your God,—that Yahweh may repent him, as to the calamity which he hath spoken concerning you.

content: 14 But I behold me! in your hand,—do with me as may be good and right in your eyes;
content_old: 14 But I behold me! in your hand,—do with me as may be good and right in your eyes;

content: 15 Only､ ye must know that If ye do put me to death verily innocent blood are ye laying upon yourselves, and against this city､ and against her inhabitants,—for of a truth did Yahweh send me unto you, to speak in your ears､ all these words.
content_old: 15 Only､ ye must know that If ye do put me to death verily innocent blood are ye laying upon yourselves, and against this city､ and against her inhabitants,—for of a truth did Yahweh send me unto you, to speak in your ears､ all these words.

content: 16 Then said the princes､ and all the people, unto the priests､ and unto the prophets,— There is nothing in this man､ worthy of death, for in the name of Yahweh our God hath he spoken unto us.
content_old: 16 Then said the princes､ and all the people, unto the priests､ and unto the prophets,— There is nothing in this man､ worthy of death, for in the name of Yahweh our God hath he spoken unto us.

content: 17 Then rose up men､ from among the elders of the land, and spake unto all the convocation of the people､ saying:
content_old: 17 Then rose up men､ from among the elders of the land, and spake unto all the convocation of the people､ saying:

content: 18 Micah the Morashtite was prophesying､ in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah,—and he spake unto all the people of Judah､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Zion as a field shall be plowed’､ And Jerusalem into heaps of ruins shall be turned, And the mountain of the house be like mounds in a jungle.
content_old: 18 Micah the Morashtite was prophesying､ in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah,—and he spake unto all the people of Judah､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Zion as a field shall be plowed’､ And Jerusalem into heaps of ruins shall be turned, And the mountain of the house be like mounds in a jungle.

content: 19 Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death? Did he not revere Yahweh, and appease the face of Yahweh? And did not Yahweh repent him､ as to the calamity which he had spoken against them? We therefore､ are doing a great wickedness､ against our own lives!
content_old: 19 Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death? Did he not revere Yahweh, and appease the face of Yahweh? And did not Yahweh repent him､ as to the calamity which he had spoken against them? We therefore､ are doing a great wickedness､ against our own lives!

content: 20 There was､ however､ a man prophesying in the name of Yahweh, Urijah､ son of Shemaiah, of Keriath-jearim,—who prophesied､ against this city､ and against this land, according to all the words of Jeremiah.
content_old: 20 There was､ however､ a man prophesying in the name of Yahweh, Urijah､ son of Shemaiah, of Keriath-jearim,—who prophesied､ against this city､ and against this land, according to all the words of Jeremiah.

content: 21 And when King Jehoiakim､ and all his mighty men､ and all the princes､ heard his words then the king sought to put him to death,—but Urijah heard, and feared､ and fled､ and entered Egypt.
content_old: 21 And when King Jehoiakim､ and all his mighty men､ and all the princes､ heard his words then the king sought to put him to death,—but Urijah heard, and feared､ and fled､ and entered Egypt.

content: 22 Then did King Jehoiakim send men to Egypt,—even Elnathan son of Achbor､ and certain men with him､ into Egypt､
content_old: 22 Then did King Jehoiakim send men to Egypt,—even Elnathan son of Achbor､ and certain men with him､ into Egypt､

content: 23 and they brought forth Urijah out of Egypt､ and took him in unto King Jehoiakim, who smote him with the sword,—and cast out his dead body among the graves of the sons of the people.
content_old: 23 and they brought forth Urijah out of Egypt､ and took him in unto King Jehoiakim, who smote him with the sword,—and cast out his dead body among the graves of the sons of the people.

content: 1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:
content_old: 1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:

content: 2 Thus said Yahweh unto me, Make thee､ bonds and bars, and put them upon thine own neck.
content_old: 2 Thus said Yahweh unto me, Make thee､ bonds and bars, and put them upon thine own neck.

content: 3 Then shalt thou send them unto the king of Edom､ and unto the king of Moab､ and unto the king of the sons of Ammon, and unto the king of Tyre､ and unto the king of Zidon,—by the hand of messengers coming into Jerusalem, unto Zedekiah king of Judah.
content_old: 3 Then shalt thou send them unto the king of Edom､ and unto the king of Moab､ and unto the king of the sons of Ammon, and unto the king of Tyre､ and unto the king of Zidon,—by the hand of messengers coming into Jerusalem, unto Zedekiah king of Judah.

content: 4 And thou shalt give them charge､ unto their lords､ saying,— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Thus shall ye say unto your lords:—
content_old: 4 And thou shalt give them charge､ unto their lords､ saying,— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Thus shall ye say unto your lords:—

content: 5 I made The earth— The man and the beast that are on the face of the earth— By my great power, And by mine outstretched arm,— And gave it to whomsoever was right in mine own eyes.
content_old: 5 I made The earth— The man and the beast that are on the face of the earth— By my great power, And by mine outstretched arm,— And gave it to whomsoever was right in mine own eyes.

content: 6 Now therefore､ I have given all these lands､ into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ my servant,— Moreover also the wild beast of the field have I given him､ to serve him.
content_old: 6 Now therefore､ I have given all these lands､ into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ my servant,— Moreover also the wild beast of the field have I given him､ to serve him.

content: 7 Therefore shall all the nations serve him､ and his son､ and his son’s son,—until the time even of his own land itself arrive, when many nations and great kings shall use him as a slave.
content_old: 7 Therefore shall all the nations serve him､ and his son､ and his son’s son,—until the time even of his own land itself arrive, when many nations and great kings shall use him as a slave.

content: 8 And it shall come to pass､ that the nation or kingdom which will not serve him､ even Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and that will not put its neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon,—with sword､ and with famine､ and with pestilence will I bring punishment upon that nation､ Declareth Yahweh､ until I have consumed them by his hand.
content_old: 8 And it shall come to pass､ that the nation or kingdom which will not serve him､ even Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and that will not put its neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon,—with sword､ and with famine､ and with pestilence will I bring punishment upon that nation､ Declareth Yahweh､ until I have consumed them by his hand.

content: 9 Ye therefore､ do not ye hearken unto your prophets､ nor unto your diviners､ nor unto your dreams, nor unto your users of hidden arts､ nor unto your mutterers of incantations,—in that they are speaking unto you､ saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon;
content_old: 9 Ye therefore､ do not ye hearken unto your prophets､ nor unto your diviners､ nor unto your dreams, nor unto your users of hidden arts､ nor unto your mutterers of incantations,—in that they are speaking unto you､ saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon;

content: 10 for falsehood are they prophesying unto you,—that ye may be far removed from off your own soil, and I drive you out､ and ye be destroyed.
content_old: 10 for falsehood are they prophesying unto you,—that ye may be far removed from off your own soil, and I drive you out､ and ye be destroyed.

content: 11 But the nation that shall bring its neck into the yoke of the king of Babylon､ and serve him I will let them remain in quietness upon their own soil､ Declareth Yahweh, and they shall till it､ and dwell therein.
content_old: 11 But the nation that shall bring its neck into the yoke of the king of Babylon､ and serve him I will let them remain in quietness upon their own soil､ Declareth Yahweh, and they shall till it､ and dwell therein.

content: 12 Also unto Zedekiah king of Judah spake I, according to all these words､ saying,— Bring your necks into the yoke of the king of Babylon､ and serve him and his people､ and live!
content_old: 12 Also unto Zedekiah king of Judah spake I, according to all these words､ saying,— Bring your necks into the yoke of the king of Babylon､ and serve him and his people､ and live!

content: 13 Wherefore should ye die､ thou､ and thy people, by sword､ by famine､ and by pestilence,—as Yahweh hath spoken､ against the nation that will not serve the king of Babylon?
content_old: 13 Wherefore should ye die､ thou､ and thy people, by sword､ by famine､ and by pestilence,—as Yahweh hath spoken､ against the nation that will not serve the king of Babylon?

content: 14 Do not､ then､ hearken unto the words of the prophets who are speaking unto you, saying— Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon,—for falsehood are they prophesying unto you.
content_old: 14 Do not､ then､ hearken unto the words of the prophets who are speaking unto you, saying— Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon,—for falsehood are they prophesying unto you.

content: 15 For I have not sent them､ Declareth Yahweh, but they are prophesying in my name､ falsely,—to the end I may drive you out and ye be destroyed, ye､ and the prophets who are prophesying unto you.
content_old: 15 For I have not sent them､ Declareth Yahweh, but they are prophesying in my name､ falsely,—to the end I may drive you out and ye be destroyed, ye､ and the prophets who are prophesying unto you.

content: 16 Also unto the priests､ and unto all this people spake I､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh, Do not hearken unto the words of your prophets､ who are prophesying unto you､ saying, Lo! the vessels of the house of Yahweh are to be brought back out of Babylon､ now､ quickly; for falsehood are they prophesying unto you.
content_old: 16 Also unto the priests､ and unto all this people spake I､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh, Do not hearken unto the words of your prophets､ who are prophesying unto you､ saying, Lo! the vessels of the house of Yahweh are to be brought back out of Babylon､ now､ quickly; for falsehood are they prophesying unto you.

content: 17 Do not hearken unto them, serve the king of Babylon､ and live! wherefore should this city become a desolation?
content_old: 17 Do not hearken unto them, serve the king of Babylon､ and live! wherefore should this city become a desolation?

content: 18 But if prophets they are, and if the word of Yahweh is with them let them intercede､ I pray you､ with Yahweh of hosts, that the vessels which are left remaining in the house of Yahweh､ and the house of the king of Judah､ and in Jerusalem､ come not into Babylon.
content_old: 18 But if prophets they are, and if the word of Yahweh is with them let them intercede､ I pray you､ with Yahweh of hosts, that the vessels which are left remaining in the house of Yahweh､ and the house of the king of Judah､ and in Jerusalem､ come not into Babylon.

content: 19 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Concerning the pillars, and concerning the sea､ and concerning the stands,—and concerning the residue of the vessels that remain in this city
content_old: 19 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts— Concerning the pillars, and concerning the sea､ and concerning the stands,—and concerning the residue of the vessels that remain in this city

content: 20 which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took not､ when he carried away captive Jeconiah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ from Jerusalem to Babylon,—with all the nobles of Judah and Jerusalem
content_old: 20 which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took not､ when he carried away captive Jeconiah son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ from Jerusalem to Babylon,—with all the nobles of Judah and Jerusalem

content: 21 Yea— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel— Concerning the vessels that are left､ in the house of Yahweh､ and the house of the king of Judah､ and Jerusalem
content_old: 21 Yea— Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel— Concerning the vessels that are left､ in the house of Yahweh､ and the house of the king of Judah､ and Jerusalem

content: 1 And it came to pass in that year､ in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year､ in the fifth month that Hananiah son of Azzur､ the prophet who was of Gibeon､ spake unto me in the house of Yahweh, before the eyes of the priests and all the people､ saying:
content_old: 1 And it came to pass in that year､ in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year､ in the fifth month that Hananiah son of Azzur､ the prophet who was of Gibeon､ spake unto me in the house of Yahweh, before the eyes of the priests and all the people､ saying:

content: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ saying,— I have broken the yoke of the king of Babylon:
content_old: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ saying,— I have broken the yoke of the king of Babylon:

content: 3 within the space of two years I am bringing back into this place, all the vessels of the house of Yahweh,—which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon hath taken away from this place, and carried into Babylon.
content_old: 3 within the space of two years I am bringing back into this place, all the vessels of the house of Yahweh,—which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon hath taken away from this place, and carried into Babylon.

content: 4 Jeconiah also､ son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ with all the captives of Judah who have entered Babylon am I bringing back into this place､ Declareth Yahweh,— for I will break the yoke of the king of Babylon.
content_old: 4 Jeconiah also､ son of Jehoiakim king of Judah､ with all the captives of Judah who have entered Babylon am I bringing back into this place､ Declareth Yahweh,— for I will break the yoke of the king of Babylon.

content: 5 Then said Jeremiah the prophet, unto Hananiah the prophet, in the presence of the priests､ and in the presence of all the people､ who were standing in the house of Yahweh
content_old: 5 Then said Jeremiah the prophet, unto Hananiah the prophet, in the presence of the priests､ and in the presence of all the people､ who were standing in the house of Yahweh

content: 6 then said Jeremiah the prophet,— Amen! So may Yahweh do! Yahweh establish thy words which thou hast prophesied､ by bringing back the vessels of the house of Yahweh and all them of the captivity､ from Babylon､ unto this place.
content_old: 6 then said Jeremiah the prophet,— Amen! So may Yahweh do! Yahweh establish thy words which thou hast prophesied､ by bringing back the vessels of the house of Yahweh and all them of the captivity､ from Babylon､ unto this place.

content: 7 Nevertheless hear thou､ I pray thee､ this word, which I am speaking in thine ears,—and in the ears of all the people:
content_old: 7 Nevertheless hear thou､ I pray thee､ this word, which I am speaking in thine ears,—and in the ears of all the people:

content: 8 The prophets who were before me and before thee､ from age-past times when they prophesied against many lands､ and concerning great kingdoms, of war､ and of calamity､ and of pestilence
content_old: 8 The prophets who were before me and before thee､ from age-past times when they prophesied against many lands､ and concerning great kingdoms, of war､ and of calamity､ and of pestilence

content: 9 the prophet who prophesied of peace when the word of the prophet was fulfilled then was known the prophet, whom Yahweh had sent in truth.
content_old: 9 the prophet who prophesied of peace when the word of the prophet was fulfilled then was known the prophet, whom Yahweh had sent in truth.

content: 10 Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from off the neck of Jeremiah the prophet,—and brake it.
content_old: 10 Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from off the neck of Jeremiah the prophet,—and brake it.

content: 11 And Hananiah spake before the eyes of all the people､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh,— In like manner will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ within the space of two years, from off the neck of all the nations. And Jeremiah the prophet went his way.
content_old: 11 And Hananiah spake before the eyes of all the people､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh,— In like manner will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ within the space of two years, from off the neck of all the nations. And Jeremiah the prophet went his way.

content: 12 Then came the word of Yahweh unto Jeremiah after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke from off the neck of Jeremiah the prophet saying:
content_old: 12 Then came the word of Yahweh unto Jeremiah after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke from off the neck of Jeremiah the prophet saying:

content: 13 Go and speak unto Hananiah､ saying— Thus saith Yahweh, Yokes of wood thou hast broken,— But thou shalt make､ in their stead､ yokes of iron!
content_old: 13 Go and speak unto Hananiah､ saying— Thus saith Yahweh, Yokes of wood thou hast broken,— But thou shalt make､ in their stead､ yokes of iron!

content: 14 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel,— A yoke of iron have I put upon the neck of all these nations､ to serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and they shall serve him! Moreover also the wild beast of the field have I given to him.
content_old: 14 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel,— A yoke of iron have I put upon the neck of all these nations､ to serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and they shall serve him! Moreover also the wild beast of the field have I given to him.

content: 15 Then said Jeremiah the prophet unto Hananiah the prophet,— Hear､ I pray thee､ Hananiah: Yahweh hath not sent thee, Thou therefore､ hast caused this people to trust in falsehood!
content_old: 15 Then said Jeremiah the prophet unto Hananiah the prophet,— Hear､ I pray thee､ Hananiah: Yahweh hath not sent thee, Thou therefore､ hast caused this people to trust in falsehood!

content: 16 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! driving thee away from off the face of the ground,— This year art thou to die, Because revolt hast thou spoken against Yahweh.
content_old: 16 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! driving thee away from off the face of the ground,— This year art thou to die, Because revolt hast thou spoken against Yahweh.

content: 1 Now these are the words of the letter which Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem,—unto the residue of the elders of the captivity､ and unto the priests､ and unto the prophets､ and unto all the people, whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon;
content_old: 1 Now these are the words of the letter which Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem,—unto the residue of the elders of the captivity､ and unto the priests､ and unto the prophets､ and unto all the people, whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon;

content: 2 after that Jeconiah the king and the queen-mother and the eunuchs､ the princes of Judah and Jerusalem and the craftsmen and the smiths､ had gone forth from Jerusalem;—
content_old: 2 after that Jeconiah the king and the queen-mother and the eunuchs､ the princes of Judah and Jerusalem and the craftsmen and the smiths､ had gone forth from Jerusalem;—

content: 3 by the hand of Elasah son of Shaphan､ and Gemariah son of Hilkiah, whom Zedekiah king of Judah sent unto Babylon､ to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ saying:—
