content_old: 3 by the hand of Elasah son of Shaphan､ and Gemariah son of Hilkiah, whom Zedekiah king of Judah sent unto Babylon､ to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon､ saying:—

content: 4 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Unto all the captivity whom I have suffered to be carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon:
content_old: 4 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Unto all the captivity whom I have suffered to be carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon:

content: 5 Build ye houses､ and dwell in them,— And plant ye gardens､ and eat the fruit thereof;
content_old: 5 Build ye houses､ and dwell in them,— And plant ye gardens､ and eat the fruit thereof;

content: 6 Take ye wives､ and beget sons and daughters, And take wives for your sons and your daughters give ye to husbands, That they may bear sons and daughters,— And so become ye many there､ and do not become few;
content_old: 6 Take ye wives､ and beget sons and daughters, And take wives for your sons and your daughters give ye to husbands, That they may bear sons and daughters,— And so become ye many there､ and do not become few;

content: 7 And seek the welfare of the city whither I have caused you to be carried away captives, and pray for her unto Yahweh,— For in her welfare shall ye have welfare.
content_old: 7 And seek the welfare of the city whither I have caused you to be carried away captives, and pray for her unto Yahweh,— For in her welfare shall ye have welfare.

content: 8 For thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Let not your prophets that are in your midst､ nor your diviners､ beguile you,— Neither hearken ye unto your dreams､ which ye are dreaming;
content_old: 8 For thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Let not your prophets that are in your midst､ nor your diviners､ beguile you,— Neither hearken ye unto your dreams､ which ye are dreaming;

content: 9 For falsely are they prophesying unto you､ in my name,— I have not sent them, Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 9 For falsely are they prophesying unto you､ in my name,— I have not sent them, Declareth Yahweh.

content: 10 For thus saith Yahweh,— That as soon as there are fulfilled to Babylon seventy years I will visit you,—and establish for you､ my good word, by causing you to return unto this place.
content_old: 10 For thus saith Yahweh,— That as soon as there are fulfilled to Babylon seventy years I will visit you,—and establish for you､ my good word, by causing you to return unto this place.

content: 11 For I know the plans which I am planning for you､ Declareth Yahweh,— Plans of welfare､ and not of calamity, To give you a future and a hope.
content_old: 11 For I know the plans which I am planning for you､ Declareth Yahweh,— Plans of welfare､ and not of calamity, To give you a future and a hope.

content: 12 So shall ye call upon me,— And go and pray unto me,— And I will hearken unto you;
content_old: 12 So shall ye call upon me,— And go and pray unto me,— And I will hearken unto you;

content: 13 So shall ye seek me, and find､ For ye will enquire after me､ with all your heart;
content_old: 13 So shall ye seek me, and find､ For ye will enquire after me､ with all your heart;

content: 14 And I will be found of you､ Declareth Yahweh, And will turn back your captivity､ And will gather you out of all the nations､ and out of all the places､ whither I have driven you､ Declareth Yahweh, And will bring you back into the place whence I had caused you to be carried away captive:
content_old: 14 And I will be found of you､ Declareth Yahweh, And will turn back your captivity､ And will gather you out of all the nations､ and out of all the places､ whither I have driven you､ Declareth Yahweh, And will bring you back into the place whence I had caused you to be carried away captive:

content: 15 Because ye have said,— Yahweh hath raised us up prophets in Babylon.
content_old: 15 Because ye have said,— Yahweh hath raised us up prophets in Babylon.

content: 16 For Thus saith Yahweh､ Against the king who is sitting on the throne of David, and Against all the people who are remaining in this city,—your brethren who have not gone forth with you into captivity:
content_old: 16 For Thus saith Yahweh､ Against the king who is sitting on the throne of David, and Against all the people who are remaining in this city,—your brethren who have not gone forth with you into captivity:

content: 17 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Behold me! sending upon them､ sword､ famine､ and pestilence,— So will I make them like the horrid figs､ that cannot be eaten for badness;
content_old: 17 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Behold me! sending upon them､ sword､ famine､ and pestilence,— So will I make them like the horrid figs､ that cannot be eaten for badness;

content: 18 Therefore will I pursue them､ with sword､ with famine､ and with pestilence,— And will make them a terror to all the kingdoms of the earth､ A curse and an astonishment and a hissing and a reproach, among all the nations whither I have driven them:
content_old: 18 Therefore will I pursue them､ with sword､ with famine､ and with pestilence,— And will make them a terror to all the kingdoms of the earth､ A curse and an astonishment and a hissing and a reproach, among all the nations whither I have driven them:

content: 19 Because they hearkened not unto my words､ Declareth Yahweh,— which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets､ betimes sending them､ yet hearkened they not､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 19 Because they hearkened not unto my words､ Declareth Yahweh,— which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets､ betimes sending them､ yet hearkened they not､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 20 Ye therefore､ hear ye the word of Yahweh, all ye of the captivity､ whom I have sent from Jerusalem to Babylon:
content_old: 20 Ye therefore､ hear ye the word of Yahweh, all ye of the captivity､ whom I have sent from Jerusalem to Babylon:

content: 21 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ Concerning Ahab son of Kolaiah､ and concerning Zedekiah son of Maaseiah､ who are prophesying to you in my name a falsehood, Behold me! delivering them into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and he will smite them before your eyes:
content_old: 21 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ Concerning Ahab son of Kolaiah､ and concerning Zedekiah son of Maaseiah､ who are prophesying to you in my name a falsehood, Behold me! delivering them into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and he will smite them before your eyes:

content: 22 So shall there be taken up—from them—a curse､ by all of the captivity of Judah who are in Babylon､ saying,— Yahweh make thee like Zedekiah and like Ahab, Whom the king of Babylon roasted in the fire!
content_old: 22 So shall there be taken up—from them—a curse､ by all of the captivity of Judah who are in Babylon､ saying,— Yahweh make thee like Zedekiah and like Ahab, Whom the king of Babylon roasted in the fire!

content: 23 Because they have committed vileness in Israel､ And have committed adultery with the wives of their neighbours, And have spoken､ as a word in my name､ a falsehood which I commanded them not,— And I am one who knoweth—and a witness､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 23 Because they have committed vileness in Israel､ And have committed adultery with the wives of their neighbours, And have spoken､ as a word in my name､ a falsehood which I commanded them not,— And I am one who knoweth—and a witness､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 24 Also unto Shemaiah the Nehelamite shalt thou speak､ saying:
content_old: 24 Also unto Shemaiah the Nehelamite shalt thou speak､ saying:

content: 25 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, saying,— Because thou hast sent, in thine own name､ letters､ unto all the people who are in Jerusalem, and unto Zephaniah son of Maaseiah the priest, and unto all the priests､ saying:
content_old: 25 Thus speaketh Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, saying,— Because thou hast sent, in thine own name､ letters､ unto all the people who are in Jerusalem, and unto Zephaniah son of Maaseiah the priest, and unto all the priests､ saying:

content: 26 Yahweh hath made thee priest､ instead of Jehoiada the priest, that ye should be deputies in the house of Yahweh, to any man who is raving and prophesying, so shalt thou put him into the stocks and into the pillory:
content_old: 26 Yahweh hath made thee priest､ instead of Jehoiada the priest, that ye should be deputies in the house of Yahweh, to any man who is raving and prophesying, so shalt thou put him into the stocks and into the pillory:

content: 27 Now therefore､ why hast thou not rebuked Jeremiah of Anathoth, who is prophesying unto you?
content_old: 27 Now therefore､ why hast thou not rebuked Jeremiah of Anathoth, who is prophesying unto you?

content: 28 For on this account hath he sent unto us in Babylon､ saying,— ’Tis long! Build ye houses､ and dwell in them, And plant gardens､ and eat the fruit thereof.
content_old: 28 For on this account hath he sent unto us in Babylon､ saying,— ’Tis long! Build ye houses､ and dwell in them, And plant gardens､ and eat the fruit thereof.

content: 29 And Zephaniah the priest hath read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet
content_old: 29 And Zephaniah the priest hath read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet

content: 30 Therefore hath the word of Yahweh come unto Jeremiah､ saying:
content_old: 30 Therefore hath the word of Yahweh come unto Jeremiah､ saying:

content: 31 Send thou unto all them of the captivity､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh､ Concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite,— Because Shemaiah hath prophesied to you､ when I had not sent him, And hath caused you to trust in falsehood
content_old: 31 Send thou unto all them of the captivity､ saying, Thus saith Yahweh､ Concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite,— Because Shemaiah hath prophesied to you､ when I had not sent him, And hath caused you to trust in falsehood

content: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:—
content_old: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:—

content: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh､ God of Israel､ saying,— Write thee all the words which I have spoken unto thee､ in a scroll;
content_old: 2 Thus speaketh Yahweh､ God of Israel､ saying,— Write thee all the words which I have spoken unto thee､ in a scroll;

content: 3 For lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, when I will turn the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, Saith Yahweh,— and will bring them back into the land which I gave to their fathers､ that they might possess it.
content_old: 3 For lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, when I will turn the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, Saith Yahweh,— and will bring them back into the land which I gave to their fathers､ that they might possess it.

content: 4 Now these are the words which Yahweh hath spoken against Israel and against Judah:
content_old: 4 Now these are the words which Yahweh hath spoken against Israel and against Judah:

content: 5 Yea thus saith Yahweh, A voice of trembling have we heard, Dread､ and not welfare!
content_old: 5 Yea thus saith Yahweh, A voice of trembling have we heard, Dread､ and not welfare!

content: 6 Ask､ I pray you､ and see, whether a male travaileth with child! Why have I seen Every man with his hands upon his loins､ like a woman in travail, and Every face turned into ghastliness?
content_old: 6 Ask､ I pray you､ and see, whether a male travaileth with child! Why have I seen Every man with his hands upon his loins､ like a woman in travail, and Every face turned into ghastliness?

content: 7 Alas! for great is that day､ so that none is like it,— Yea a time of anguish it is for Jacob, But out of it shall he be saved.
content_old: 7 Alas! for great is that day､ so that none is like it,— Yea a time of anguish it is for Jacob, But out of it shall he be saved.

content: 8 And it shall come to pass､ in that day､ Declareth Yahweh of hosts､ That I will break his yoke from off thy neck, And thy bonds will I tear off,— And foreigners shall use him as a slave no more;
content_old: 8 And it shall come to pass､ in that day､ Declareth Yahweh of hosts､ That I will break his yoke from off thy neck, And thy bonds will I tear off,— And foreigners shall use him as a slave no more;

content: 9 But they shall serve Yahweh their God,—and David their king, whom I will raise up unto them.
content_old: 9 But they shall serve Yahweh their God,—and David their king, whom I will raise up unto them.

content: 10 Thou therefore､ do not fear､ O my Servant Jacob､ Urgeth Yahweh､ Neither be thou dismayed､ O Israel, For behold me! saving thee from afar､ And thy seed out of the land of their captivity,— Then shall Jacob return､ and rest and be quiet､ And there shall be none to make him afraid;
content_old: 10 Thou therefore､ do not fear､ O my Servant Jacob､ Urgeth Yahweh､ Neither be thou dismayed､ O Israel, For behold me! saving thee from afar､ And thy seed out of the land of their captivity,— Then shall Jacob return､ and rest and be quiet､ And there shall be none to make him afraid;

content: 11 For with thee am I､ Declareth Yahweh､ To save thee,— Though I make an end of all the nations whither I have scattered thee Yet will I not of thee make an end, But will chastise thee in measure､ not holding thee guiltless!
content_old: 11 For with thee am I､ Declareth Yahweh､ To save thee,— Though I make an end of all the nations whither I have scattered thee Yet will I not of thee make an end, But will chastise thee in measure､ not holding thee guiltless!

content: 12 For thus saith Yahweh— Incurable is thine injury,— Grievous is thy wound:
content_old: 12 For thus saith Yahweh— Incurable is thine injury,— Grievous is thy wound:

content: 13 There is none to plead thy cause､ for binding thee up,— Healing bandages hast thou none:
content_old: 13 There is none to plead thy cause､ for binding thee up,— Healing bandages hast thou none:

content: 14 All thy lovers have forgotten thee, Thyself do they not seek,— For With the wounding of an enemy have I wounded thee､ With the correction of one who is cruel, Because of the abounding of thine iniquity, Because numerous have been thy sins.
content_old: 14 All thy lovers have forgotten thee, Thyself do they not seek,— For With the wounding of an enemy have I wounded thee､ With the correction of one who is cruel, Because of the abounding of thine iniquity, Because numerous have been thy sins.

content: 15 Why shouldst thou make outcry over thine injury, Incurable is thy pain? Because of the abounding of thine iniquity､ Because numerous have been thy sins Have I done these things unto thee.
content_old: 15 Why shouldst thou make outcry over thine injury, Incurable is thy pain? Because of the abounding of thine iniquity､ Because numerous have been thy sins Have I done these things unto thee.

content: 16 Therefore all who devour thee shall be devoured, And all thine adversaries—all of them into captivity shall depart,— So shall they who plundered thee be plundered, And all who preyed upon thee will I deliver up as a prey.
content_old: 16 Therefore all who devour thee shall be devoured, And all thine adversaries—all of them into captivity shall depart,— So shall they who plundered thee be plundered, And all who preyed upon thee will I deliver up as a prey.

content: 17 For I will put a bandage Upon thee､ And from thy wounds will I heal thee､ Declareth Yahweh,— Because An outcast they called thee, ’Tis Zion! who hath none to ask for her welfare
content_old: 17 For I will put a bandage Upon thee､ And from thy wounds will I heal thee､ Declareth Yahweh,— Because An outcast they called thee, ’Tis Zion! who hath none to ask for her welfare

content: 18 Thus saith Yahweh— Behold me! bringing back the captivity of the tents of Jacob, And on his habitations will I have compassion,— So shall the city be built､ upon her own mound, And the citadel upon its own site shall remain:
content_old: 18 Thus saith Yahweh— Behold me! bringing back the captivity of the tents of Jacob, And on his habitations will I have compassion,— So shall the city be built､ upon her own mound, And the citadel upon its own site shall remain:

content: 19 So shall there proceed from them Thanksgiving､ and The sound of them who make merry,— And I will multiply them､ and they shall not become few, And will make them honourable､ and they shall not be despised:
content_old: 19 So shall there proceed from them Thanksgiving､ and The sound of them who make merry,— And I will multiply them､ and they shall not become few, And will make them honourable､ and they shall not be despised:

content: 20 And his sons shall come to be as aforetime, And his assembly before me shall continue,— And I will bring punishment on all his oppressors;
content_old: 20 And his sons shall come to be as aforetime, And his assembly before me shall continue,— And I will bring punishment on all his oppressors;

content: 21 And his illustrious one shall spring from himself And his ruler from his own midst shall proceed, And I will bring him near､ and he shall approach unto me,— For who is there that hath pledged his own heart to approach unto me? Demandeth Yahweh:
content_old: 21 And his illustrious one shall spring from himself And his ruler from his own midst shall proceed, And I will bring him near､ and he shall approach unto me,— For who is there that hath pledged his own heart to approach unto me? Demandeth Yahweh:

content: 22 So shall ye become my people; And I will become your God.
content_old: 22 So shall ye become my people; And I will become your God.

content: 23 Lo! the tempest of Yahweh! Indignation hath come forth, A tempest rolling itself upward,— Upon the head of the lawless ones shall it hurl itself down!
content_old: 23 Lo! the tempest of Yahweh! Indignation hath come forth, A tempest rolling itself upward,— Upon the head of the lawless ones shall it hurl itself down!

content: 1 At that time Declareth Yahweh, I will become a God､ to all the families of Israel; And they shall become my people.
content_old: 1 At that time Declareth Yahweh, I will become a God､ to all the families of Israel; And they shall become my people.

content: 2 Thus saith Yahweh,— There hath found favour in the desert､ a people escaped from the sword,— I must go to cause him､ even Israel､ to rest.
content_old: 2 Thus saith Yahweh,— There hath found favour in the desert､ a people escaped from the sword,— I must go to cause him､ even Israel､ to rest.

content: 3 From afar Yahweh hath appeared unto me. Yea with an age-abiding love have I loved thee, For this cause have I prolonged to thee lovingkindness.
content_old: 3 From afar Yahweh hath appeared unto me. Yea with an age-abiding love have I loved thee, For this cause have I prolonged to thee lovingkindness.

content: 4 Again will I build thee､ and thou shalt be built, thou virgin､ Israel,— Again shalt thou deck thyself with thy timbrels, And go forth in the dance of them that make merry:
content_old: 4 Again will I build thee､ and thou shalt be built, thou virgin､ Israel,— Again shalt thou deck thyself with thy timbrels, And go forth in the dance of them that make merry:

content: 5 Again shalt thou plant vineyards in the mountains of Samaria,— The planters have planted､ and have laid open the vineyards.
content_old: 5 Again shalt thou plant vineyards in the mountains of Samaria,— The planters have planted､ and have laid open the vineyards.

content: 6 For it is a day the watchmen have proclaimed throughout the hill country of Ephraim,— Arise ye､ and let us go up to Zion, unto Yahweh our God.
content_old: 6 For it is a day the watchmen have proclaimed throughout the hill country of Ephraim,— Arise ye､ and let us go up to Zion, unto Yahweh our God.

content: 7 For thus saith Yahweh— Shout ye for Jacob�� with gladness, Make shrill thy voice､ as the head of the nations,— Publish ye､ praise ye､ and say, Save thou､ O Yahweh､ thy people, the remnant of Israel.
content_old: 7 For thus saith Yahweh— Shout ye for Jacob�� with gladness, Make shrill thy voice､ as the head of the nations,— Publish ye､ praise ye､ and say, Save thou､ O Yahweh､ thy people, the remnant of Israel.

content: 8 Behold me! bringing them in out of the land of the North､ And I will gather them out of the remote parts of the earth, Among them the blind and the lame､ The woman with child and she that giveth birth together,— A great convocation shall return hither:
content_old: 8 Behold me! bringing them in out of the land of the North､ And I will gather them out of the remote parts of the earth, Among them the blind and the lame､ The woman with child and she that giveth birth together,— A great convocation shall return hither:

content: 9 With weeping shall they come in､ And with supplications will I lead them, I will bring them unto rivers of waters､ By a smooth way､ wherein they shall not stumble,— For I have become to Israel a father, And as for Ephraim my firstborn is he!
content_old: 9 With weeping shall they come in､ And with supplications will I lead them, I will bring them unto rivers of waters､ By a smooth way､ wherein they shall not stumble,— For I have become to Israel a father, And as for Ephraim my firstborn is he!

content: 10 Hear ye the word of Yahweh､ O ye nations, And declare ye in the Coastlands､ afar off,— And say— He that scattereth Israel will gather him, And watch over him､ as a shepherd his flock;
content_old: 10 Hear ye the word of Yahweh､ O ye nations, And declare ye in the Coastlands､ afar off,— And say— He that scattereth Israel will gather him, And watch over him､ as a shepherd his flock;

content: 11 For Yahweh hath ransomed Jacob,— And redeemed him from the hand of one stronger than he.
content_old: 11 For Yahweh hath ransomed Jacob,— And redeemed him from the hand of one stronger than he.

content: 12 Then shall they come in､ and shall shout in triumph on the height of Zion, And shall stream unto the goodness of Yahweh､ To the wheat､ and to the new wine､ and to the oil, and to the young of the flocks and of the herds,— So shall their soul become like a garden well watered, And they shall not again languish anymore.
content_old: 12 Then shall they come in､ and shall shout in triumph on the height of Zion, And shall stream unto the goodness of Yahweh､ To the wheat､ and to the new wine､ and to the oil, and to the young of the flocks and of the herds,— So shall their soul become like a garden well watered, And they shall not again languish anymore.

content: 13 Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance, And young men and elders､ rejoice together,— And I will turn their mourning into gladness､ and will comfort them, And will make them rejoice from their sorrow;
content_old: 13 Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance, And young men and elders､ rejoice together,— And I will turn their mourning into gladness､ and will comfort them, And will make them rejoice from their sorrow;

content: 14 Then will I satiate the soul of the priests､ with fatness, And my people with my goodness shall be satisfied､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 14 Then will I satiate the soul of the priests､ with fatness, And my people with my goodness shall be satisfied､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 15 Thus saith Yahweh— A voice in Ramah is heard, Wailing､ bitter weeping, Rachel､ weeping for her children,— She refuseth to be comforted for her children, For they are not!
content_old: 15 Thus saith Yahweh— A voice in Ramah is heard, Wailing､ bitter weeping, Rachel､ weeping for her children,— She refuseth to be comforted for her children, For they are not!

content: 16 Thus saith Yahweh— Restrain thy voice from weeping, And thine eyes from tears,— For there is a reward for thy labour､ Declareth Yahweh, So they shall return from the land of the enemy:
content_old: 16 Thus saith Yahweh— Restrain thy voice from weeping, And thine eyes from tears,— For there is a reward for thy labour､ Declareth Yahweh, So they shall return from the land of the enemy:

content: 17 Yea there is hope for thy future､ Declareth Yahweh,— And thy sons shall return to their own boundary.
content_old: 17 Yea there is hope for thy future､ Declareth Yahweh,— And thy sons shall return to their own boundary.

content: 18 I have heard Ephraim､ bemoaning himself, Thou hast chastised me､ and I have been chastised, Like a bullock not broken in. Suffer me to return､ that I may return, For thou art Yahweh my God.
content_old: 18 I have heard Ephraim､ bemoaning himself, Thou hast chastised me､ and I have been chastised, Like a bullock not broken in. Suffer me to return､ that I may return, For thou art Yahweh my God.

content: 19 Surely after my return I was filled with regret, And after I came to know myself I smote upon the thigh,— I turned pale､ and was even confounded, For I had borne the reproach of my youthful days.
content_old: 19 Surely after my return I was filled with regret, And after I came to know myself I smote upon the thigh,— I turned pale､ and was even confounded, For I had borne the reproach of my youthful days.

content: 20 Was Ephraim a very precious son to me? Was he a most delightful child? For as often as I have spoken against him I have remembered him again! For this cause have my affections been deeply moved for him, I must have compassion upon him､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 20 Was Ephraim a very precious son to me? Was he a most delightful child? For as often as I have spoken against him I have remembered him again! For this cause have my affections been deeply moved for him, I must have compassion upon him､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 21 Erect thee waymarks､ Set thee up finger-posts, Apply thy heart to The highway— The road by which thou didst depart,— Return､ O virgin of Israel, Return unto these thy cities.
content_old: 21 Erect thee waymarks､ Set thee up finger-posts, Apply thy heart to The highway— The road by which thou didst depart,— Return､ O virgin of Israel, Return unto these thy cities.

content: 22 How long wilt thou turn hither and thither, O apostate daughter? For Yahweh hath created a new thing in the earth, A female defendeth a strong man!
content_old: 22 How long wilt thou turn hither and thither, O apostate daughter? For Yahweh hath created a new thing in the earth, A female defendeth a strong man!

content: 23 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Again shall they say this word､ in the land of Judah and in the cities thereof, when I cause their captivity to return, Yahweh bless thee､ Thou home of righteousness! Thou mountain of holiness!
content_old: 23 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Again shall they say this word､ in the land of Judah and in the cities thereof, when I cause their captivity to return, Yahweh bless thee､ Thou home of righteousness! Thou mountain of holiness!

content: 24 Then shall there dwell throughout Judah itself and all the cities thereof､ together,— Husbandmen､ who shall move about with a flock;
content_old: 24 Then shall there dwell throughout Judah itself and all the cities thereof､ together,— Husbandmen､ who shall move about with a flock;

content: 25 For I have satiated the weary soul,— And every languishing soul have I filled.
content_old: 25 For I have satiated the weary soul,— And every languishing soul have I filled.

content: 26 Upon this I awoke and considered,— And my sleep had been sweet to me!
content_old: 26 Upon this I awoke and considered,— And my sleep had been sweet to me!

content: 27 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh— That I will sow The house of Israel､ and The house of Judah, With the seed of men､ and With the seed of beasts;
content_old: 27 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh— That I will sow The house of Israel､ and The house of Judah, With the seed of men､ and With the seed of beasts;

content: 28 And it shall come to pass､ that— Just as I watched over them､ to root up and to break down and to tear out and to destroy､ and to break in pieces So will I watch over them､ to build and to plant､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 28 And it shall come to pass､ that— Just as I watched over them､ to root up and to break down and to tear out and to destroy､ and to break in pieces So will I watch over them､ to build and to plant､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 29 In those days shall they say no more, Fathers did eat sour grapes,— And children’s teeth are blunted!
content_old: 29 In those days shall they say no more, Fathers did eat sour grapes,— And children’s teeth are blunted!

content: 30 But every one for his own iniquity shall die,— Any human being who eateth the sour grapes his own teeth shall be blunted.
content_old: 30 But every one for his own iniquity shall die,— Any human being who eateth the sour grapes his own teeth shall be blunted.

content: 31 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh,— When I will solemnise— With the house of Israel､ and With the house of Judah, A new covenant:
content_old: 31 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh,— When I will solemnise— With the house of Israel､ and With the house of Judah, A new covenant:

content: 32 Not like the covenant wihch I solemnised with their fathers, In the day when I grasped their hand, to bring them forth out of the land of Egypt,— In that they brake my covenant､ Though I had become a husband unto them､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 32 Not like the covenant wihch I solemnised with their fathers, In the day when I grasped their hand, to bring them forth out of the land of Egypt,— In that they brake my covenant､ Though I had become a husband unto them､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 33 For this is the covenant which I will solemnise with the house of Israel､ after those days､ Declareth Yahweh, I will put my law within them, Yea on their heart will I write it,— So will I become their God, And they shall become my people.
content_old: 33 For this is the covenant which I will solemnise with the house of Israel､ after those days､ Declareth Yahweh, I will put my law within them, Yea on their heart will I write it,— So will I become their God, And they shall become my people.

content: 34 Then shall they no longer teach Every man his neighbour､ and Every man his brother､ saying, Know ye Yahweh,— For they all shall know me､ From the least of them､ Even unto the greatest of them､ Declareth Yahweh, For I will forgive their iniquity, And their sin will I remember no more.
content_old: 34 Then shall they no longer teach Every man his neighbour､ and Every man his brother､ saying, Know ye Yahweh,— For they all shall know me､ From the least of them､ Even unto the greatest of them､ Declareth Yahweh, For I will forgive their iniquity, And their sin will I remember no more.

content: 35 Thus saith Yahweh— Who hath given the sun for a light by day, The ordinances of the moon and the stars､ for a light by night,— Who excited the sea､ and the waves thereof roared Yahweh of hosts is his name:—
content_old: 35 Thus saith Yahweh— Who hath given the sun for a light by day, The ordinances of the moon and the stars､ for a light by night,— Who excited the sea､ and the waves thereof roared Yahweh of hosts is his name:—

content: 36 If these ordinances depart from before me Declareth Yahweh,— The seed of Israel also may cease from being a nation before me､ all the days.
content_old: 36 If these ordinances depart from before me Declareth Yahweh,— The seed of Israel also may cease from being a nation before me､ all the days.

content: 37 Thus saith Yahweh— If the heavens above can be measured, Or the foundations of the earth beneath be searched out I also may reject all the seed of Israel､ for all that they have done､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 37 Thus saith Yahweh— If the heavens above can be measured, Or the foundations of the earth beneath be searched out I also may reject all the seed of Israel､ for all that they have done､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 38 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, That the city shall be built for Yahweh, From the tower of Hananeel､ As far as the gate of the corner;
content_old: 38 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh, That the city shall be built for Yahweh, From the tower of Hananeel､ As far as the gate of the corner;

content: 39 Then shall go forth again the measuring-line straight forward, Over the hill Gareb, And it shall go round to Goah;
content_old: 39 Then shall go forth again the measuring-line straight forward, Over the hill Gareb, And it shall go round to Goah;

content: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah from Yahweh, in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah,—the same was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar;
content_old: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah from Yahweh, in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah,—the same was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar;

content: 2 and then the forces of the king of Babylon were besieging Jerusalem,—and Jeremiah the prophet had been shut up in the guard-court, which was in the house of the king of Judah;
content_old: 2 and then the forces of the king of Babylon were besieging Jerusalem,—and Jeremiah the prophet had been shut up in the guard-court, which was in the house of the king of Judah;

content: 3 whom Zedekiah king of Judah had shut up､ saying,— Why art thou prophesying､ saying,— Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! giving up this city into the hand of the king of Babylon､ and he shall capture it;
content_old: 3 whom Zedekiah king of Judah had shut up､ saying,— Why art thou prophesying､ saying,— Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! giving up this city into the hand of the king of Babylon､ and he shall capture it;

content: 4 and Zedekiah king of Judah shall not be delivered out of the hand of the Chaldeans,—for he shall be wholly given up into the hand of the king of Babylon, and shall speak—the mouth of the one to the mouth of the other, and the eyes of the one into the eyes of the other shall look;
content_old: 4 and Zedekiah king of Judah shall not be delivered out of the hand of the Chaldeans,—for he shall be wholly given up into the hand of the king of Babylon, and shall speak—the mouth of the one to the mouth of the other, and the eyes of the one into the eyes of the other shall look;

content: 5 and into Babylon shall he lead Zedekiah､ and there shall he remain, until I visit him､ Declareth Yahweh,—though ye fight with the Chaldeans ye shall not prosper?
content_old: 5 and into Babylon shall he lead Zedekiah､ and there shall he remain, until I visit him､ Declareth Yahweh,—though ye fight with the Chaldeans ye shall not prosper?

content: 6 And Jeremiah said,— The word of Yahweh came unto me､ saying:
content_old: 6 And Jeremiah said,— The word of Yahweh came unto me､ saying:

content: 7 Lo! Hanameel son of Shallum thine uncle hath come unto thee､ saying,— Buy thee my field that is in Anathoth, for thine is the right of redemption､ to buy it.
content_old: 7 Lo! Hanameel son of Shallum thine uncle hath come unto thee､ saying,— Buy thee my field that is in Anathoth, for thine is the right of redemption､ to buy it.

content: 8 So Hanameel son of mine uncle came unto me､ according to the word of Yahweh､ into the guard-court, and said unto me､ Buy､ I pray thee､ my field that is in Anathoth､ which is in the land of Benjamin, for thine is the right of inheritance､ and thine the redemption､—buy it for thyself. So I knew､ that the word of Yahweh it was’.
content_old: 8 So Hanameel son of mine uncle came unto me､ according to the word of Yahweh､ into the guard-court, and said unto me､ Buy､ I pray thee､ my field that is in Anathoth､ which is in the land of Benjamin, for thine is the right of inheritance､ and thine the redemption､—buy it for thyself. So I knew､ that the word of Yahweh it was’.

content: 9 And I bought the field､ from Hanameel son of mine uncle､ that was in Anathoth,—and weighed him the silver, seventeen shekels was the silver;
content_old: 9 And I bought the field､ from Hanameel son of mine uncle､ that was in Anathoth,—and weighed him the silver, seventeen shekels was the silver;

content: 10 and I wrote in the scroll､ and sealed it, and took in attestation witnesses,—and weighed the silver in the balances.
content_old: 10 and I wrote in the scroll､ and sealed it, and took in attestation witnesses,—and weighed the silver in the balances.

content: 11 Then took I the scroll of purchase, both that which was sealed—the title and the conditions—and that which was open;
content_old: 11 Then took I the scroll of purchase, both that which was sealed—the title and the conditions—and that which was open;

content: 12 and gave the scroll of purchase､ unto Baruch son of Neriah son of Mahseiah, in the sight of Hanameel mine uncle ’s son, and in the sight of the witnesses､ who subscribed the scroll of purchase,—in the sight of all the Jews､ who were sitting in the guard-court.
content_old: 12 and gave the scroll of purchase､ unto Baruch son of Neriah son of Mahseiah, in the sight of Hanameel mine uncle ’s son, and in the sight of the witnesses､ who subscribed the scroll of purchase,—in the sight of all the Jews､ who were sitting in the guard-court.

content: 13 Then charged I Baruch､ in their sight､ saying:
content_old: 13 Then charged I Baruch､ in their sight､ saying:

content: 14 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Take thou these scrolls, this scroll of purchase､ even that which is sealed, and this scroll that is open, and put them in an earthen vessel,—that they may remain many days.
content_old: 14 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Take thou these scrolls, this scroll of purchase､ even that which is sealed, and this scroll that is open, and put them in an earthen vessel,—that they may remain many days.

content: 15 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel: Again shall houses and fields and vineyards､ be bought､ in this land.
content_old: 15 For Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel: Again shall houses and fields and vineyards､ be bought､ in this land.

content: 16 Then prayed I unto Yahweh,—after I had delivered the scroll of purchase､ unto Baruch son of Neriah, saying:—
content_old: 16 Then prayed I unto Yahweh,—after I had delivered the scroll of purchase､ unto Baruch son of Neriah, saying:—

content: 17 Alas! My Lord､ Yahweh! Lo! thou thyself didst make the heavens､ and the earth, by thy great might､ and by thine outstretched arm,— There is nothing too wonderful for thee:
content_old: 17 Alas! My Lord､ Yahweh! Lo! thou thyself didst make the heavens､ and the earth, by thy great might､ and by thine outstretched arm,— There is nothing too wonderful for thee:

content: 18 Executing lovingkindness unto thousands, But recompensing the iniquity of fathers､ into the bosom of their children after them, Thou GOD､ the great､ the mighty, Yahweh of hosts is his name:
content_old: 18 Executing lovingkindness unto thousands, But recompensing the iniquity of fathers､ into the bosom of their children after them, Thou GOD､ the great､ the mighty, Yahweh of hosts is his name:

content: 19 Great in counsel､ and mighty in deed,— Whose eyes are open on all the ways of the sons of men, to give unto every one According to his ways､ and According to the fruit of his doings:
content_old: 19 Great in counsel､ and mighty in deed,— Whose eyes are open on all the ways of the sons of men, to give unto every one According to his ways､ and According to the fruit of his doings:

content: 20 Who didst set signs and wonders､ in the land of Egypt, unto this day, and in Israel､ and among mankind,— And didst make for thyself a name､ as at this day;
content_old: 20 Who didst set signs and wonders､ in the land of Egypt, unto this day, and in Israel､ and among mankind,— And didst make for thyself a name､ as at this day;

content: 21 And didst bring forth thy people Israel､ out of the land of Egypt, With signs and with wonders､ and With a strong hand､ and With an outstretched arm, and With great terror;
content_old: 21 And didst bring forth thy people Israel､ out of the land of Egypt, With signs and with wonders､ and With a strong hand､ and With an outstretched arm, and With great terror;

content: 22 And didst give unto them this land､ which thou hadst sworn to their fathers to give unto them,—a land flowing with milk and honey;
content_old: 22 And didst give unto them this land､ which thou hadst sworn to their fathers to give unto them,—a land flowing with milk and honey;

content: 23 And they came in and took possession of it､ But hearkened not unto thy voice､ Nor in thy law did they walk, Nought of what thou hadst commanded them to do did they do,— And so thou hast caused to befall them､ all this calamity.
content_old: 23 And they came in and took possession of it､ But hearkened not unto thy voice､ Nor in thy law did they walk, Nought of what thou hadst commanded them to do did they do,— And so thou hast caused to befall them､ all this calamity.

content: 24 Lo! the earthworks! they have entered the city､ to capture it, And the city hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans､ who are fighting against it, because of the sword and the famine and the pestilence,— And so what thou didst speak hath come to pass､ And there thou art､ looking on!
content_old: 24 Lo! the earthworks! they have entered the city､ to capture it, And the city hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans､ who are fighting against it, because of the sword and the famine and the pestilence,— And so what thou didst speak hath come to pass､ And there thou art､ looking on!

content: 25 Yet thou thyself saidst unto me､ O My Lord､ Yahweh, Buy thee the field for silver､ And take in attestation witnesses,— Whereas the city hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans!
content_old: 25 Yet thou thyself saidst unto me､ O My Lord､ Yahweh, Buy thee the field for silver､ And take in attestation witnesses,— Whereas the city hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans!

content: 26 Then came the word of Yahweh､ unto Jeremiah､ saying:—
content_old: 26 Then came the word of Yahweh､ unto Jeremiah､ saying:—

content: 27 Lo! I am Yahweh､ God of all flesh､— For me is any thing too wonderful?
content_old: 27 Lo! I am Yahweh､ God of all flesh､— For me is any thing too wonderful?

content: 28 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! giving this city into the hand of the Chaldeans､ and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and he shall capture it;
content_old: 28 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! giving this city into the hand of the Chaldeans､ and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and he shall capture it;

content: 29 And the Chaldeans､ who are fighting against this city､ Shall enter, and Shall set this city on fire and Shall consume it,— With the houses on whose roofs they burned incense to Baal､ and poured out drink-offerings to other gods, that they might provoke me to anger;
content_old: 29 And the Chaldeans､ who are fighting against this city､ Shall enter, and Shall set this city on fire and Shall consume it,— With the houses on whose roofs they burned incense to Baal､ and poured out drink-offerings to other gods, that they might provoke me to anger;

content: 30 For the sons of Israel and the sons of Judah have been nothing but doers of wickedness in my sight､ from the days of their youth,— For the sons of Israel have been doing nothing but provoke me to anger by the workmanship of their hands､ Declareth Yahweh;
content_old: 30 For the sons of Israel and the sons of Judah have been nothing but doers of wickedness in my sight､ from the days of their youth,— For the sons of Israel have been doing nothing but provoke me to anger by the workmanship of their hands､ Declareth Yahweh;

content: 31 For According to mine anger､ and According to mine indignation hath been to me this city, from the day when they built it､ even unto this day,—that I should pull it down from before my face:
content_old: 31 For According to mine anger､ and According to mine indignation hath been to me this city, from the day when they built it､ even unto this day,—that I should pull it down from before my face:

content: 32 because of all the wickedness of the sons of Israel and the sons of Judah､ which they have done to provoke me to anger, they､ their kings､ their princes､ their priests､ and their prophets, and the men of Judah､ and the inhabitants of Jerusalem:
content_old: 32 because of all the wickedness of the sons of Israel and the sons of Judah､ which they have done to provoke me to anger, they､ their kings､ their princes､ their priests､ and their prophets, and the men of Judah､ and the inhabitants of Jerusalem:

content: 33 Thus have they turned unto me the back､ and not the face,— Though I instructed them､ betimes instructing them Yet have they not been hearkening､ to receive correction:
content_old: 33 Thus have they turned unto me the back､ and not the face,— Though I instructed them､ betimes instructing them Yet have they not been hearkening､ to receive correction:

content: 34 But have set their abominations in the house on which my name hath been called､ to defile it;
content_old: 34 But have set their abominations in the house on which my name hath been called､ to defile it;

content: 35 And have built the high places of Baal､ which are in the valley of Ben-hinnom､ To cause their sons and their daughters to pass through unto Molech, Which I commanded them not､ Neither came it up on my heart, That they should do this horrible thing,— Causing Judah to sin!
content_old: 35 And have built the high places of Baal､ which are in the valley of Ben-hinnom､ To cause their sons and their daughters to pass through unto Molech, Which I commanded them not､ Neither came it up on my heart, That they should do this horrible thing,— Causing Judah to sin!

content: 36 Now therefore because of this— Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel,— Concerning this city､ whereof ye are saying､ It hath been delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon, by sword､ and by famine､ and by pestilence:
content_old: 36 Now therefore because of this— Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel,— Concerning this city､ whereof ye are saying､ It hath been delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon, by sword､ and by famine､ and by pestilence:

content: 37 Behold me! gathering them out of all the lands､ whither I have driven them— In mine anger､ and In mine indignation､ and In great vexation,— And I will cause them to return into this place, And will make them dwell securely;
content_old: 37 Behold me! gathering them out of all the lands､ whither I have driven them— In mine anger､ and In mine indignation､ and In great vexation,— And I will cause them to return into this place, And will make them dwell securely;

content: 38 And they shall become my people,— And I will become their God;
content_old: 38 And they shall become my people,— And I will become their God;

content: 39 And I will give them one heart､ and one way, That they may revere me､ all the days,— For the good of them､ and of their children after them;
content_old: 39 And I will give them one heart､ and one way, That they may revere me､ all the days,— For the good of them､ and of their children after them;

content: 40 And I will solemnise to them､ an age-abiding covenant, That I will not turn away from following them, to do them good,— But the reverence of myself will I put in their heart, so that they shall not turn away from me.
content_old: 40 And I will solemnise to them､ an age-abiding covenant, That I will not turn away from following them, to do them good,— But the reverence of myself will I put in their heart, so that they shall not turn away from me.

content: 41 And I will rejoice over them､ to do them good,— And will plant them in this land､ in truth, with all my heart､ and with all my soul.
content_old: 41 And I will rejoice over them､ to do them good,— And will plant them in this land､ in truth, with all my heart､ and with all my soul.

content: 42 For Thus saith Yahweh, Like as I have brought upon this people all this great calamity So am I bringing upon them all the good that I am speaking concerning them.
content_old: 42 For Thus saith Yahweh, Like as I have brought upon this people all this great calamity So am I bringing upon them all the good that I am speaking concerning them.

content: 43 Therefore shall fields be bought in this land,—whereof ye are saying, It is a desolation､ Without man or beast, It hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans:
content_old: 43 Therefore shall fields be bought in this land,—whereof ye are saying, It is a desolation､ Without man or beast, It hath been given into the hand of the Chaldeans:

content: 1 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ the second time, when he was yet imprisoned in the guard-court､ saying:
content_old: 1 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ the second time, when he was yet imprisoned in the guard-court､ saying:

content: 2 Thus saith Yahweh､ who doeth it,— Yahweh､ who fashioneth it､ to establish it, Yahweh is his name:
content_old: 2 Thus saith Yahweh､ who doeth it,— Yahweh､ who fashioneth it､ to establish it, Yahweh is his name:

content: 3 Call unto me､ that I may answer thee,—and tell thee things great and inaccessible､ which thou hast not known.
content_old: 3 Call unto me､ that I may answer thee,—and tell thee things great and inaccessible､ which thou hast not known.

content: 4 For Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel. Concerning the houses of this city, and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah,—which are thrown down against the earthworks and against the sword:
content_old: 4 For Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel. Concerning the houses of this city, and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah,—which are thrown down against the earthworks and against the sword:

content: 5 In entering to fight with the Chaldeans it is to fill them with the dead bodies of men, whom I have smitten in mine anger and in mine indignation,—and because of whom I have hidden my face from this city,—by reason of all their wickedness.
content_old: 5 In entering to fight with the Chaldeans it is to fill them with the dead bodies of men, whom I have smitten in mine anger and in mine indignation,—and because of whom I have hidden my face from this city,—by reason of all their wickedness.

content: 6 Behold me! laying upon her a bandage of healing､ so will I heal them,— And will reveal to them abundance of prosperity and truth;
content_old: 6 Behold me! laying upon her a bandage of healing､ so will I heal them,— And will reveal to them abundance of prosperity and truth;

content: 7 And I will bring back Them of the captivity of Judah, and Them of the captivity of Israel,— And I will build them､ as at the first;
content_old: 7 And I will bring back Them of the captivity of Judah, and Them of the captivity of Israel,— And I will build them､ as at the first;

content: 8 And I will purify them､ from all their iniquity wherewith they have sinned against me,— And I will grant pardon for all their iniquities､ Wherewith they have sinned against me, and Wherewith they have transgressed against me;
content_old: 8 And I will purify them､ from all their iniquity wherewith they have sinned against me,— And I will grant pardon for all their iniquities､ Wherewith they have sinned against me, and Wherewith they have transgressed against me;

content: 9 So shall she become to me､— A name of joy､ A praise､ and An adorning, To all the nations of the earth,— Who will hear all the good which I’ am doing them, And will dread and be deeply moved､ over all the good and over all the prosperity which I am causing her.
content_old: 9 So shall she become to me､— A name of joy､ A praise､ and An adorning, To all the nations of the earth,— Who will hear all the good which I’ am doing them, And will dread and be deeply moved､ over all the good and over all the prosperity which I am causing her.

content: 10 Thus saith Yahweh— Again shall be heard in this place, as to which ye’ are saying, Deserted it is､ without man or beast, In the cities of Judah､ and in the streets of Jerusalem, Which are desolate without man or inhabitant or beast
content_old: 10 Thus saith Yahweh— Again shall be heard in this place, as to which ye’ are saying, Deserted it is､ without man or beast, In the cities of Judah､ and in the streets of Jerusalem, Which are desolate without man or inhabitant or beast

content: 11 The voice of joy, and the voice of gladness､ The voice of the bridegroom､ and the voice of the bride, The voice of them who are saying､ Praise ye Yahweh of hosts､ For good in Yahweh､ For age-abiding is his lovingkindness, The voice of them who are bringing a thank-offering into the house of Yahweh,— For I will bring back the captives of the land､ as at the first､ Saith Yahweh.
content_old: 11 The voice of joy, and the voice of gladness､ The voice of the bridegroom､ and the voice of the bride, The voice of them who are saying､ Praise ye Yahweh of hosts､ For good in Yahweh､ For age-abiding is his lovingkindness, The voice of them who are bringing a thank-offering into the house of Yahweh,— For I will bring back the captives of the land､ as at the first､ Saith Yahweh.

content: 12 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Again shall there be in this place— Which is deserted､ without man or even, beast— And all the cities thereof,— The home of shepherds, causing flocks to lie down.
content_old: 12 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts, Again shall there be in this place— Which is deserted､ without man or even, beast— And all the cities thereof,— The home of shepherds, causing flocks to lie down.

content: 13 In the cities of the hill country､ In the cities of the lowland､ and In the cities of the South, and In the land of Benjamin､ and In the places round about Jerusalem､ and In the cities of Judah Again shall the flock pass over the hands of the numberer､ Saith Yahweh.
content_old: 13 In the cities of the hill country､ In the cities of the lowland､ and In the cities of the South, and In the land of Benjamin､ and In the places round about Jerusalem､ and In the cities of Judah Again shall the flock pass over the hands of the numberer､ Saith Yahweh.

content: 14 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh,— when I will establish my good word, which I have spoken— As to the house of Israel､ And concerning the house of Judah:
content_old: 14 Lo! days are coming､ Declareth Yahweh,— when I will establish my good word, which I have spoken— As to the house of Israel､ And concerning the house of Judah:

content: 15 In those days､ and at that time will I cause to bud unto David､ A Bud of righteousness,— And he shall execute justice and righteousness､ in the land:
content_old: 15 In those days､ and at that time will I cause to bud unto David､ A Bud of righteousness,— And he shall execute justice and righteousness､ in the land:

content: 16 In those days Judah shall be saved, and Jerusalem abide securely,— And this is that which shall be proclaimed to her— Yahweh our righteousness!
content_old: 16 In those days Judah shall be saved, and Jerusalem abide securely,— And this is that which shall be proclaimed to her— Yahweh our righteousness!

content: 17 For Thus saith Yahweh,— There shall not be wanting to David､— A man to sit upon the throne of the house of Israel;
content_old: 17 For Thus saith Yahweh,— There shall not be wanting to David､— A man to sit upon the throne of the house of Israel;

content: 18 Nor to the priests the Levites shall there he wanting— A man､ before me, To offer an ascending-sacrifice､ or To make a perfume with a gift､ or To offer a peace- offering､ all the days!
content_old: 18 Nor to the priests the Levites shall there he wanting— A man､ before me, To offer an ascending-sacrifice､ or To make a perfume with a gift､ or To offer a peace- offering､ all the days!

content: 19 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ saying:
content_old: 19 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ saying:

content: 20 Thus saith Yahweh, If ye can break, My covenant of the day､ and My covenant of the night, That there be not day and night in their season
content_old: 20 Thus saith Yahweh, If ye can break, My covenant of the day､ and My covenant of the night, That there be not day and night in their season

content: 21 My covenant also may be broken､ With David my servant, That he shall not have a son､ to reign upon his throne､— And with the Levites the priests､ mine attendants:
content_old: 21 My covenant also may be broken､ With David my servant, That he shall not have a son､ to reign upon his throne､— And with the Levites the priests､ mine attendants:

content: 22 As the host of the heavens cannot be recorded, Nor the sand of the sea be measured So will I multiply, The seed of David my servant, And the Levites who attend upon me.
content_old: 22 As the host of the heavens cannot be recorded, Nor the sand of the sea be measured So will I multiply, The seed of David my servant, And the Levites who attend upon me.

content: 23 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ saying:
content_old: 23 And the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ saying:

content: 24 Hast thou not observed､ what this people have spoken､ saying, The two families which Yahweh did choose he hath even cast them off? And so my people they despise, as though they could not again become a nation in their sight!
content_old: 24 Hast thou not observed､ what this people have spoken､ saying, The two families which Yahweh did choose he hath even cast them off? And so my people they despise, as though they could not again become a nation in their sight!

content: 25 Thus saith Yahweh, If my covenant of day and night, the ordinances of the heavens and the earth I did not appoint
content_old: 25 Thus saith Yahweh, If my covenant of day and night, the ordinances of the heavens and the earth I did not appoint

content: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､—when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon and all his force and all the kingdoms of the earth the dominion of his hand､ and all the peoples､ were fighting against Jerusalem and against all her cities､ saying:
content_old: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､—when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon and all his force and all the kingdoms of the earth the dominion of his hand､ and all the peoples､ were fighting against Jerusalem and against all her cities､ saying:

content: 2 Thus saith Yahweh God of Israel, Go and speak unto Zedekiah､ king of Judah,—and say unto him— Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! giving this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he will burn it with fire;
content_old: 2 Thus saith Yahweh God of Israel, Go and speak unto Zedekiah､ king of Judah,—and say unto him— Thus saith Yahweh, Behold me! giving this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he will burn it with fire;

content: 3 And thou shalt not escape out of his hand, For thou shalt be taken, And into his hand shalt thou be delivered,— And thine own eyes into the eyes of the king of Babylon shall look､ And his mouth with thy mouth shall speak､ And Babylon shalt thou enter.
content_old: 3 And thou shalt not escape out of his hand, For thou shalt be taken, And into his hand shalt thou be delivered,— And thine own eyes into the eyes of the king of Babylon shall look､ And his mouth with thy mouth shall speak､ And Babylon shalt thou enter.

content: 4 Nevertheless hear the word of Yahweh､ O Zedekiah､ king of Judah,— Thus saith Yahweh､ Concerning thee, Thou shalt not die by the sword;
content_old: 4 Nevertheless hear the word of Yahweh､ O Zedekiah､ king of Judah,— Thus saith Yahweh､ Concerning thee, Thou shalt not die by the sword;

content: 5 In peace shalt thou die､ And with the burnings made for thy fathers､ the former kings who were before thee so shall they make a burning unto thee, And with an Alas lord! shall they lament thee,— Because of the word I have spoken､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 5 In peace shalt thou die､ And with the burnings made for thy fathers､ the former kings who were before thee so shall they make a burning unto thee, And with an Alas lord! shall they lament thee,— Because of the word I have spoken､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 6 Then spake Jeremiah the prophet､ unto Zedekiah king of Judah､ all these words､ in Jerusalem;
content_old: 6 Then spake Jeremiah the prophet､ unto Zedekiah king of Judah､ all these words､ in Jerusalem;

content: 7 when the force of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of Judah that were left,—against Lachish and against Azekah, for they remained among the cities of Judah､ as fortified cities.
content_old: 7 when the force of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of Judah that were left,—against Lachish and against Azekah, for they remained among the cities of Judah､ as fortified cities.

content: 8 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､—after that King Zedekiah had solemnised a covenant with all the people who were in Jerusalem, proclaiming unto them liberty:
content_old: 8 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､—after that King Zedekiah had solemnised a covenant with all the people who were in Jerusalem, proclaiming unto them liberty:

content: 9 that every man should let his servant and every man his handmaid､ being a Hebrew or a Hebrewess go free,—so that no man should use them as slaves､ to wit a Jew his brother;
content_old: 9 that every man should let his servant and every man his handmaid､ being a Hebrew or a Hebrewess go free,—so that no man should use them as slaves､ to wit a Jew his brother;

content: 10 so then they hearkened—even all the princes and all the people who had entered into the covenant､ that every man should let his servant and every man his hand-maid go free､ so as not to use them as slaves any longer,—yea they hearkened､ and let them go,
content_old: 10 so then they hearkened—even all the princes and all the people who had entered into the covenant､ that every man should let his servant and every man his hand-maid go free､ so as not to use them as slaves any longer,—yea they hearkened､ and let them go,

content: 11 howbeit they turned､ after that､ and brought back the servants and the hand-maids whom they had let go free, and brought them into subjection as servants and as hand-maids
content_old: 11 howbeit they turned､ after that､ and brought back the servants and the hand-maids whom they had let go free, and brought them into subjection as servants and as hand-maids

content: 12 So then the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､ saying:
content_old: 12 So then the word of Yahweh came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh､ saying:

content: 13 Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel,— I myself solemnised a covenant with your fathers, in the day when I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slaves､ saying:
content_old: 13 Thus saith Yahweh､ God of Israel,— I myself solemnised a covenant with your fathers, in the day when I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slaves､ saying:

content: 14 At the end of seven years shall ye let go､ every man his brother､ being a Hebrew､ who shall sell himself unto thee､ and serve thee six years, then shalt thou let him go free from thee. Howbeit your fathers hearkened not unto me､ neither inclined their ear.
content_old: 14 At the end of seven years shall ye let go､ every man his brother､ being a Hebrew､ who shall sell himself unto thee､ and serve thee six years, then shalt thou let him go free from thee. Howbeit your fathers hearkened not unto me､ neither inclined their ear.

content: 15 And though ye just now turned､ and did that which was right in mine eyes, by proclaiming liberty､ every man to his neighbour,—and solemnised a covenant before me, in the house on which my Name hath been called
content_old: 15 And though ye just now turned､ and did that which was right in mine eyes, by proclaiming liberty､ every man to his neighbour,—and solemnised a covenant before me, in the house on which my Name hath been called

content: 16 yet have ye turned and profaned my Name, and brought back every man his servant､ and every man his hand-maid, whom ye had let go free､ at their own desire,—and have brought them into subjection､ to become your servants and handmaids.
content_old: 16 yet have ye turned and profaned my Name, and brought back every man his servant､ and every man his hand-maid, whom ye had let go free､ at their own desire,—and have brought them into subjection､ to become your servants and handmaids.

content: 17 Therefore— Thus saith Yahweh, Ye have not hearkened unto me, in proclaiming liberty､ every man to his brother and every man to his neighbour: Behold me! proclaiming to you a liberty Declareth Yahweh､ unto the sword､ unto the pestilence､ and unto the famine, so will I make you a terror to all the kingdoms of the earth;
content_old: 17 Therefore— Thus saith Yahweh, Ye have not hearkened unto me, in proclaiming liberty､ every man to his brother and every man to his neighbour: Behold me! proclaiming to you a liberty Declareth Yahweh､ unto the sword､ unto the pestilence､ and unto the famine, so will I make you a terror to all the kingdoms of the earth;

content: 18 and will give the men who are transgressing my covenant in that they have not confirmed the words of the covenant, which they solemnised before me, when they cut the calf in twain, and passed between the parts thereof;
content_old: 18 and will give the men who are transgressing my covenant in that they have not confirmed the words of the covenant, which they solemnised before me, when they cut the calf in twain, and passed between the parts thereof;

content: 19 even the princes of Judah､ and the princes of Jerusalem､ the eunuchs､ and the priests, and all the people of the land,—who passed between the parts of the calf
content_old: 19 even the princes of Judah､ and the princes of Jerusalem､ the eunuchs､ and the priests, and all the people of the land,—who passed between the parts of the calf

content: 20 yea I will give them into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—and their dead bodies shall become food､ for the birds of the heavens､ and for the beasts of the earth.
content_old: 20 yea I will give them into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—and their dead bodies shall become food､ for the birds of the heavens､ and for the beasts of the earth.

content: 21 Zedekiah king of Judah also､ with his princes will I give into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—even into the hand of the force of the king of Babylon, who are going up from you.
content_old: 21 Zedekiah king of Judah also､ with his princes will I give into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them who are seeking their life,—even into the hand of the force of the king of Babylon, who are going up from you.

content: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh,—in the days of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah､ saying:
content_old: 1 The word which came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh,—in the days of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah､ saying:

content: 2 Go unto the house of the Rechabites, and speak with them, and bring them into the house of Yahweh, into one of the chambers,—and give them wine to drink.
content_old: 2 Go unto the house of the Rechabites, and speak with them, and bring them into the house of Yahweh, into one of the chambers,—and give them wine to drink.

content: 3 So I took Jaazaniah､ son of Jeremiah､ son of Habazziniah, and his brethren､ and all his sons,—and all the house of the Rechabites;
content_old: 3 So I took Jaazaniah､ son of Jeremiah､ son of Habazziniah, and his brethren､ and all his sons,—and all the house of the Rechabites;

content: 4 and brought them into the house of Yahweh, into the chamber of the sons of Hanan son of Igdaliah､ a man of God,—which was beside the chamber of the princes, which was above the chamber of Maaseiah son of Shallum､ keeper of the porch;
content_old: 4 and brought them into the house of Yahweh, into the chamber of the sons of Hanan son of Igdaliah､ a man of God,—which was beside the chamber of the princes, which was above the chamber of Maaseiah son of Shallum､ keeper of the porch;

content: 5 and I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites､ bowls full of wine､ and cups,—and said unto them､ Drink ye wine.
content_old: 5 and I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites､ bowls full of wine､ and cups,—and said unto them､ Drink ye wine.

content: 6 Then said they,— We will not drink wine,—for Jonadab son of Rechab､ our father laid command upon us､ saying, Ye shall not drink wine､ ye､ nor your sons､ unto times age-abiding;
content_old: 6 Then said they,— We will not drink wine,—for Jonadab son of Rechab､ our father laid command upon us､ saying, Ye shall not drink wine､ ye､ nor your sons､ unto times age-abiding;

content: 7 nor house shall ye build､ nor seed shall ye sow､ nor vineyard shall ye plant, neither shall ye have them,—but in tents shall ye dwell､ all your days, that ye may live many days､ on the face of the soil where ye are sojourning.
content_old: 7 nor house shall ye build､ nor seed shall ye sow､ nor vineyard shall ye plant, neither shall ye have them,—but in tents shall ye dwell､ all your days, that ye may live many days､ on the face of the soil where ye are sojourning.

content: 8 So we have hearkened unto the voice of Jonadab son of Rechab､ our father, in all that he commanded us,—not to drink wine all our days, we､ our wives､ our sons､ nor our daughters;
content_old: 8 So we have hearkened unto the voice of Jonadab son of Rechab､ our father, in all that he commanded us,—not to drink wine all our days, we､ our wives､ our sons､ nor our daughters;

content: 9 and not to build houses for us to dwell in､—and so vineyard or field or seed have we none;
content_old: 9 and not to build houses for us to dwell in､—and so vineyard or field or seed have we none;

content: 10 but we have dwelt in tents,—and have hearkened and done, according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
content_old: 10 but we have dwelt in tents,—and have hearkened and done, according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.

content: 11 And so it came to pass､ when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land､ that we said,— Let us even enter Jerusalem, because of the force of the Chaldeans and because of the force of the Syrians: So have we dwelt in Jerusalem.
content_old: 11 And so it came to pass､ when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land､ that we said,— Let us even enter Jerusalem, because of the force of the Chaldeans and because of the force of the Syrians: So have we dwelt in Jerusalem.

content: 12 Then came the word of Yahweh unto Jeremiah､ saying:
content_old: 12 Then came the word of Yahweh unto Jeremiah､ saying:

content: 13 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Go and say to the men of Judah, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem,— Will ye not receive correction､ by hearkening unto my words? Demandeth Yahweh:
content_old: 13 Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Go and say to the men of Judah, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem,— Will ye not receive correction､ by hearkening unto my words? Demandeth Yahweh:

content: 14 Confirmed are the words of Jonadab son of Rechab—which he commanded his sons､ that they should not drink wine, and they have not drunk､ until this day, for they have hearkened unto the command of their father. But I have spoken unto you､ betimes speaking, and ye have not hearkened unto me.
content_old: 14 Confirmed are the words of Jonadab son of Rechab—which he commanded his sons､ that they should not drink wine, and they have not drunk､ until this day, for they have hearkened unto the command of their father. But I have spoken unto you､ betimes speaking, and ye have not hearkened unto me.

content: 15 And I sent unto you all my servants the prophets､ betimes sending､ saying, Return､ I pray you—every man from his wicked way､ And amend your doings､ And do not go after other gods to serve them, So shall ye remain on the soil､ which I gave to you､ and to your fathers,— but ye have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened unto me.
content_old: 15 And I sent unto you all my servants the prophets､ betimes sending､ saying, Return､ I pray you—every man from his wicked way､ And amend your doings､ And do not go after other gods to serve them, So shall ye remain on the soil､ which I gave to you､ and to your fathers,— but ye have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened unto me.

content: 16 Because the sons of Jonadab son of Rechab have confirmed the commandment of their father､ which he commanded them,—whereas this people have not hearkened unto me
content_old: 16 Because the sons of Jonadab son of Rechab have confirmed the commandment of their father､ which he commanded them,—whereas this people have not hearkened unto me

content: 17 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh､ God of hosts､ God of Israel, Behold me! bringing in against Judah､ and against all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, all the calamity､ which I have spoken concerning them,— Because I spake unto them､ and they did not hearken, And I called to them､ and they did not answer.
content_old: 17 Therefore Thus saith Yahweh､ God of hosts､ God of Israel, Behold me! bringing in against Judah､ and against all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, all the calamity､ which I have spoken concerning them,— Because I spake unto them､ and they did not hearken, And I called to them､ and they did not answer.

content: 18 But to the house of the Rechabites said Jeremiah: Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Because ye have hearkened unto the commandment of Jonadab your father, and have kept all his commandments, and done’ according to all that he commanded you
content_old: 18 But to the house of the Rechabites said Jeremiah: Thus saith Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel, Because ye have hearkened unto the commandment of Jonadab your father, and have kept all his commandments, and done’ according to all that he commanded you

content: 1 And it came to pass､ in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah, that this word came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:
content_old: 1 And it came to pass､ in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah､ king of Judah, that this word came unto Jeremiah､ from Yahweh, saying:

content: 2 Take thee a scroll, and write therein､ all the words which I have spoken unto thee､ concerning Israel､ and concerning Judah､ and concerning all the nations,— from the day I began to speak unto thee､ from the days of Josiah, even until this day:
content_old: 2 Take thee a scroll, and write therein､ all the words which I have spoken unto thee､ concerning Israel､ and concerning Judah､ and concerning all the nations,— from the day I began to speak unto thee､ from the days of Josiah, even until this day:

content: 3 Peradventure the house of Judah will hearken’ unto all the calamity､ which I am devising to execute against them,—to the end they may return､ every man from his wicked way, whereupon I will forgive their iniquity､ and their sin.
content_old: 3 Peradventure the house of Judah will hearken’ unto all the calamity､ which I am devising to execute against them,—to the end they may return､ every man from his wicked way, whereupon I will forgive their iniquity､ and their sin.

content: 4 So Jeremiah called Baruch､ son of Neriah,—and Baruch wrote､ from the mouth of Jeremiah､ all the words of Yahweh which he had spoken unto him､ upon a scroll.
content_old: 4 So Jeremiah called Baruch､ son of Neriah,—and Baruch wrote､ from the mouth of Jeremiah､ all the words of Yahweh which he had spoken unto him､ upon a scroll.

content: 5 Then did Jeremiah command Baruch､ saying,— I am hindered, I cannot enter the house of Yahweh;
content_old: 5 Then did Jeremiah command Baruch､ saying,— I am hindered, I cannot enter the house of Yahweh;

content: 6 Thou therefore shalt enter､ and read in the roll which thou hast written from my mouth､ the words of Yahweh､ in the ears of the people､ in the house of Yahweh､ on the day of a fast,—moreover also in the ears of all Judah who are coming in out of their cities shalt thou read them:
content_old: 6 Thou therefore shalt enter､ and read in the roll which thou hast written from my mouth､ the words of Yahweh､ in the ears of the people､ in the house of Yahweh､ on the day of a fast,—moreover also in the ears of all Judah who are coming in out of their cities shalt thou read them:

content: 7 Peradventure their supplication will fall prostrate､ before Yahweh, and they return every man from his wicked way,— For great are the anger and the indignation､ which Yahweh hath spoken against this people.
content_old: 7 Peradventure their supplication will fall prostrate､ before Yahweh, and they return every man from his wicked way,— For great are the anger and the indignation､ which Yahweh hath spoken against this people.

content: 8 So then Baruch son of Neriah did according to all which Jeremiah the prophet commanded him, reading in the book the words of Yahweh､ in the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 8 So then Baruch son of Neriah did according to all which Jeremiah the prophet commanded him, reading in the book the words of Yahweh､ in the house of Yahweh.

content: 9 And it came to pass in the fifth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah､ in the ninth month, that all the people of Jerusalem, and all the people who were coming in out of the cities of Judah､ into Jerusalem､ had all proclaimed a fast before Yahweh;
content_old: 9 And it came to pass in the fifth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah king of Judah､ in the ninth month, that all the people of Jerusalem, and all the people who were coming in out of the cities of Judah､ into Jerusalem､ had all proclaimed a fast before Yahweh;

content: 10 Baruch, therefore､ read in the book､ the words of Jeremiah､ in the house of Yahweh,—in the chamber of Gemariah son of Shaphan—the scribe､ in the upper court､ at the opening of the new gate of the house of Yahweh, in the ears of all the people.
content_old: 10 Baruch, therefore､ read in the book､ the words of Jeremiah､ in the house of Yahweh,—in the chamber of Gemariah son of Shaphan—the scribe､ in the upper court､ at the opening of the new gate of the house of Yahweh, in the ears of all the people.

content: 11 When Micaiah､ son of Gemariah son of Shaphan､ heard all the words of Yahweh､ out of the book
content_old: 11 When Micaiah､ son of Gemariah son of Shaphan､ heard all the words of Yahweh､ out of the book

content: 12 then went he down unto the house of the king up to the chamber of the scribe, and lo! there all the princes sitting,—Elishama the scribe､ and Delaiah son of Shemaiah､ and Elnathan son of Achbor､ and Gemariah son of Shaphan､ and Zedekiah son of Hananiah､ and all the princes.
content_old: 12 then went he down unto the house of the king up to the chamber of the scribe, and lo! there all the princes sitting,—Elishama the scribe､ and Delaiah son of Shemaiah､ and Elnathan son of Achbor､ and Gemariah son of Shaphan､ and Zedekiah son of Hananiah､ and all the princes.

content: 13 So Micaiah told them all the words which he heard,—when Baruch read in the book､ in the ears of the people.
content_old: 13 So Micaiah told them all the words which he heard,—when Baruch read in the book､ in the ears of the people.

content: 14 All the princes､ therefore､ sent unto Baruch､ Jehudi､ son of Nethaniah son of Shelemiah son of Cushi､ saying, The roll､ wherein thou didst read in the ears of the people take it in thy hand､ and come. So Baruch son of Neriah took the roll in his hand, and came in unto them.
content_old: 14 All the princes､ therefore､ sent unto Baruch､ Jehudi､ son of Nethaniah son of Shelemiah son of Cushi､ saying, The roll､ wherein thou didst read in the ears of the people take it in thy hand､ and come. So Baruch son of Neriah took the roll in his hand, and came in unto them.
